        const airports = ['MAD', 'BCN', 'LHR', 'CDG']

        const preload = (maxIntents) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (document.querySelector('.journey-select_list')) {
                    verifyEachFly();
                    setInterval(() => {
                        verifyEachFly();
                    }, 1000);
                } else if (maxIntents == 75) {
                    console.warn(numScript, "Elem didn't load");
                } else {
                    maxIntents++;
                    preload(maxIntents);
                }
            }, 300);
        };

        const verifyEachFly = () => {
            const allFlights = document.querySelectorAll('.connections_data');

            for (const fly of allFlights) {

                if (!fly.classList.contains('FB603')) {

                    fly.classList.add('FB603');

                    const conections = getConnections(fly);

                    for (conection of conections) {

                        const departure = getDeparture(conection);
                        const arrival = getArrival(conection);

                        if (validateDepartureArrival(departure, arrival) == true) {

                            const parentElemOfFly = getParentElem(conection);

                            if (parentElemOfFly.getAttribute('class').indexOf('FB603') == -1) {
                                parentElemOfFly.classList.add('FB603-' + numCss);
                                insertCss(numCss, conections.length, departure, arrival);

                                numCss++;
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        const insertCss = (numCss, numConections, departure, arrival) => {
            let styles;

            if (numConections > 1) {
                styles = cssToInsert.split('REPLACE-NUM').join(numCss)
                    .split('REPLACE-DEPARTURE').join(departure)
                    .split('REPLACE-ARRIVAL').join(arrival)
            }
            else {
                styles = cssToInsert.split('REPLACE-NUM').join(numCss)
                    .split(' (REPLACE-DEPARTURE').join('')
                    .split('- REPLACE-ARRIVAL)').join('')
            }

            let css = document.createElement("style");
            css.type = 'text/css';

            if (css.styleSheet) {
                css.styleSheet.cssText = styles
            }
            else {
                css.appendChild(document.createTextNode(styles))
            }

            document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(css);
            /******************* */
        }

        const getParentElem = (conection) => {
            messages(conection.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement, 'getParentElem()')
            return conection.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement;
        }

        const validateDepartureArrival = (departure, arrival) => {
            messages(airports.includes(departure) + ' || ' + airports.includes(arrival), 'validateDepartureArrival()')
            return airports.includes(departure) || airports.includes(arrival);
        }

        const getConnections = (fly) => {
            messages(fly.querySelectorAll('ul.connections_journeys_group'), 'getConnections()')
            return fly.querySelectorAll('ul.connections_journeys_group');
        }

        const getDeparture = (conection) => {
            messages(conection.querySelectorAll('li.connections_journeys_group_item.connections_journey .station-code')[0].textContent, 'getDeparture()')
            return conection.querySelectorAll('li.connections_journeys_group_item.connections_journey .station-code')[0].textContent
        }

        const getArrival = (conection) => {
            messages(conection.querySelectorAll('li.connections_journeys_group_item.connections_journey .station-code')[1].textContent, 'getArrival()')
            return conection.querySelectorAll('li.connections_journeys_group_item.connections_journey .station-code')[1].textContent
        }

        const messages = (message, fun) => {
            //console.log(numScript, fun, message);
        }

        const getCurrentUrl = () => {
            return window.location.href.toLowerCase();
        }

        const getPos = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pos");
        }

        const getLang = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("lang").split("-")[0].toLowerCase();
        }

        const getPageID = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pag");
        }

        preload(0);
    })();

</script>

<style>
    @media screen and (min-width: 990px) {

        html[cro-pag="availability-ns-ib"] div.page_buttons,
        html[cro-pag="availability-ns-ob"] div.page_buttons{
            display: none;
        }

        html[cro-pag="availability-ns-conf"] div.page_buttons{
            display: flex;
        }
    }

    @media screen and (max-width: 990px) {
        html[cro-pag="availability-ns-ib"] .content-wrap,
        html[cro-pag="availability-ns-ob"] .content-wrap {
            padding-bottom: 0!important;
        }

        html[cro-pag="availability-ns-conf"] .content-wrap {
            padding-bottom: 12.5rem;
        }
        
        html[cro-pag="availability-ns-ib"] .combined_summary_wrapper .summary,
        html[cro-pag="availability-ns-ob"] .combined_summary_wrapper .summary {
            display: none;
        }

        html[cro-pag="availability-ns-conf"] .combined_summary_wrapper .summary{
            display: flex;
        }
    }

    @media screen and (max-width: 767px) {}

    @media screen and (max-width: 500px) {}
</style>
<script>

    (function () {
        let device = document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth >= 1025 ? 'des' : 'mob';
        const type = "0"; // | "0_control";
        const visualizacion = "vis";
        const interaccion = "int";

        const pages = {
            availabilityNbfOB: "availability-nbfob",
            availabilityNbfIB: "availability-nbfib",
            availabilityNbfCONF: "availability-nbfconf",
            passengerNbfPAX: "passenger-nbfpax",
            ancillariesNbfASS: "ancillary-nbfaas",
            farereviewNbfFare: "farereview-nbffare",
            pagosNbfPAY: "pagos-nbfpay",
            confirmationNbfConf: "confirmation-nbfconf"
        }

        const flujo = "NBF"; // DX
        const analitycsElem = (flujo == "NBF" ? "dataLayer" : "gtmDt");
        const numScript = "[FB343]";
        console.log(numScript)

        const preload = (maxIntents) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (document.querySelector('div')) {
                    // Your code here
                }
                else if (maxIntents == 75) {
                    console.warn(numScript, "Elem didn't load");
                }
                else {
                    maxIntents++;
                    preload(maxIntents);
                }
            }, 300);
        }

        const useFullstory = () => {
            if (typeof FS !== 'undefined') {
                FS.event('AT_528984', {
                    campaignId: '528984',
                    campaignRecipeId: '0',
                    offerId: '2051360'
                })
            }
        }

        const getLang = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-lang").split("-")[0].toLowerCase();
        }

        const getPageID = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pag");
        }


        const getPos = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pos");
        }

        const trackEvents = (identificador) => {
            const pushClickanalitycs = e => { let t = "AT_528984_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " ANALITYCS: ", t), window[analitycsElem].push({ event: "sendTargetEvent", target_action: t }) }, trackEvent = (e, t) => { let a = "AT_528984_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " MBOX: ", a), adobe.target.getOffer({ mbox: a, type: type, params: { ATFunctionName: "adobe.target.getOffer", campaignId: "528984", "audienceReport_528984": !1 }, success: () => { "function" == typeof t && t() }, error: (e, t) => { console.error("conv -> trackEvent Request failed", e, t) } }) };
            // try { trackEvent(identificador, "click"); } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to adobe: ", error); }
            try { pushClickanalitycs(identificador) } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to analitycs: ", error); }
        }

        // if (device == "des" || device == "mob")
        //     preload(0);

    })();

</script>

        }

        .light-basic .fare_body .fare_list .accordion-content li.fare_list_item.disabled .fare_list_item_description {

        }

        .accordion-content li.fare_list_item.disabled .icon {
            color: #5A5A5A !important;
        }

<script>

    (function () {

        const device = document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth >= 992 ? "des" : "mob";

        const type = "1"; // | "0_control";
        const interaccion = "int";

        const flujo = "NS"; // DX || NS
        const analitycsElem = flujo == "NS" ? "dataLayer" : "gtmDt";

        const numScript = "[FB901]";
        console.log(numScript, 'Version B');

        const preload = (maxIntents) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (document.querySelector('.journey-selector.journey-selector-outbound')) {
                    setInterval(() => {
                        facelift();
                        waitForAccordion();
                    }, 750);
                } else if (maxIntents == 75) {
                    console.warn(numScript, "Elem didn't load");
                } else {
                    maxIntents++;
                    preload(maxIntents);
                }
            }, 300);
        };

        const copyAcordeon = {
            es: "Restricciones de la tarifa",
            en: "Fare Restrictions",
            pt: "Restrições da tarifa",
            fr: "Restrictions de tarif"
        };

        let lastTrackedValue = null;
        let flagBundle = true;

        let fareNameLittle;

        const facelift = () => {
            const fareControl = document.querySelectorAll(".fare-control");
            const flightSense = document.querySelectorAll('.journey-selector_header_label');
            const flightCountGeneral = flightSense.length;
            const flag = true;

            if (flightCountGeneral !== lastTrackedValue) {
                if (flightCountGeneral === 1) {
                    trackEvents("visualiza_ob");

                } else if (flightCountGeneral === 2) {
                    isHandlingClick = true;
                    trackEvents("visualiza_ib");
                    flagBundle = true;
                }
                lastTrackedValue = flightCountGeneral;
            }

            for (let i = 0; i < fareControl.length; i++) {
                let priceElement = fareControl[i].querySelector(".fare_button_price .price");
                let currencyElement = fareControl[i].querySelector(".fare_button_price .currency");

                let price = priceElement.textContent.split(' ').join('').trim();
                let currency = currencyElement.innerText.trim();

                let selectButton = fareControl[i].querySelector(".fare_button_label .button_label");
                if (selectButton) {
                    selectButton.innerText = currency + " " + price;
                }

                let pill = document.querySelector('[class*="card-baggage-text"]');

                if (pill) {
                    if (getLang() == 'es') {
                        let textContent = pill.textContent.trim();
                        if (textContent === "Añadir por") {
                            const changeText = document.querySelectorAll(".light-basic .fare_button_label .button_label");
                            for (let j = 0; j < changeText.length; j++) {
                                changeText[j].textContent = currency + " " + price;
                            }

                        } else {
                            const changeText = document.querySelectorAll(".light-basic .fare_button_label .button_label");
                            let numericPrice = parseInt(price.split('.').join(''), 10);
                            let finalPrice = numericPrice + 65000;
                            for (let k = 0; k < changeText.length; k++) {
                                changeText[k].textContent = currency + " " + finalPrice.toLocaleString("es-ES");;
                            }
                        }
                    } else {
                        let textContent = pill.textContent.trim();
                        if (textContent === "Add for") {
                            const changeText = document.querySelectorAll(".light-basic .fare_button_label .button_label");
                            for (let m = 0; m < changeText.length; m++) {
                                changeText[m].textContent = currency + " " + price;
                            }

                        } else {
                            const changeText = document.querySelectorAll(".light-basic .fare_button_label .button_label");
                            let numericPrice = parseInt(price.split(',').join(''), 10);
                            let finalPrice = numericPrice + 65000;
                            for (let r = 0; r < changeText.length; r++) {
                                changeText[r].textContent = currency + " " + finalPrice.toLocaleString("es-ES");;
                            }
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    selectButton.innerText = currency + " " + price;
                }

                if (fareControl[i].classList.contains("target-modification")) return;
                fareControl[i].classList.add("target-modification");

                fareControl[i].addEventListener("click", () => {
                    let fareNameClick = fareControl[i].querySelector('.fare_header .fare_name').innerText.trim();
                    const key = fareNameClick + "_" + (flightCountGeneral === 1 ? 'ob' : 'ib');
                    if (flagBundle) {
                        trackEvents("clic_bundle_" + key.replace(" ", ""));
                        
                        flagBundle = false;
                    }
                });


                let fareNameElement = fareControl[i].querySelector(".fare_name");
                let fareName = fareNameElement.innerText.trim().toLowerCase();
                const fareClasses = {
                    light: "fare-light",
                    basic: "fare-basic",
                    flex: "fare-flex",
                    classic: "fare-classic"
                };

                if (fareClasses[fareName]) {
                    fareControl[i].classList.add(fareClasses[fareName]);
                }

                if (fareName === "basic" || fareName === "light") {
                    fareNameLittle = fareName;

                    fareControl[i].classList.add("light-basic");
                    let fareList = fareControl[i].querySelector(".fare_list");
                    let allItems = fareList.querySelectorAll(".fare_list_item");

                    let normalItems = [];
                    let disabledItems = [];

                    for (const item of allItems) {
                        if (item.classList.contains("disabled")) {
                            disabledItems.push(item);
                        } else {
                            normalItems.push(item);
                        }
                    }

                    if (disabledItems.length > 0) {
                        if (fareName === "basic") {
                            const lastDisabled = disabledItems[disabledItems.length - 1];
                            const clonedItem = lastDisabled.cloneNode(true);
                            clonedItem.classList.add("duplicate-disabled-preview");

                            const description = clonedItem.querySelector(".fare_list_item_description");
                            if (description) {
                                description.textContent = "No incluye servicios adicionales";
                            }

                            fareList.appendChild(clonedItem);
                        }


                        let accordion = document.createElement("div");
                        accordion.classList.add("accordion-target");

                        let button = document.createElement("div");
                        button.innerText = copyAcordeon[getLang()];
                        button.classList.add("accordion-button");

                        let content = document.createElement("div");
                        content.classList.add("accordion-content");

                        for (let i = 0; i < disabledItems.length; i++) {
                            content.appendChild(disabledItems[i]);
                        }

                        accordion.appendChild(button);
                        accordion.appendChild(content);

                        if (normalItems.length > 0) {
                            normalItems[normalItems.length - 1].insertAdjacentElement("afterend", accordion);
                        } else {
                            fareList.appendChild(accordion);
                        }
                    }
                }


            };
        };

        const waitForAccordion = () => {
            const accordions = document.querySelectorAll(".accordion-target");
            for (const accordion of accordions) {
                // if (accordion && !accordion.classList.contains("event-inform")) {
                // Esto debemos dejarlo que añada eventos al elemento debido a que el modal de upselling cuando clona la card lo hace sin los eventos
                if (accordion) {
                    accordion.classList.add("event-inform")

                    const flightSense = document.querySelectorAll('.journey-selector_header_label');
                    accordion.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
                        e.stopImmediatePropagation();
                        e.stopPropagation();
                        e.preventDefault();

                        accordion.classList.toggle("open");
                        clickAcordeon = true;

                        const baggageContainer = document.querySelector('[class*="toogle-baggage-container"]');

                        if (baggageContainer) {
                            baggageContainer.style.display = accordion.classList.contains("open") ? "none" : "block";
                        }

                        const flightCount = flightSense.length;
                        const key = fareNameLittle + "_" + (flightCount === 1 ? "ob" : "ib");
                        const action = accordion.classList.contains("open") ? "abre" : "cierra";

                        trackEvents(action + "_desplegable_" + key);
                    });
                }
            }
        }

        const getPos = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pos");
        }

        const getLang = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("lang").split("-")[0].toLowerCase();
        }

        const getPageID = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pag");
        }

        const trackEvents = (identificador) => {
            const pushClickanalitycs = e => { let t = "AT_606996_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " ANALITYCS: ", t), window[analitycsElem].push({ event: "sendTargetEvent", target_action: t }) }, trackEvent = (e, t) => { let a = "AT_606996_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " MBOX: ", a), adobe.target.getOffer({ mbox: a, type: type, params: { ATFunctionName: "adobe.target.getOffer", campaignId: "606996", "audienceReport_606996": !1 }, success: () => { "function" == typeof t && t() }, error: (e, t) => { console.error("conv -> trackEvent Request failed", e, t) } }) };
            try { pushClickanalitycs(identificador) } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to analitycs: ", error); }
        }

        if (device == "des") preload(0);
    })()

</script>

            en: 'Fare'
        }

        const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);

        const preload = (maxIntents) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (document.querySelector("journey-schedule-custom") && getLang() !== 'pt') {
                    messages('Stating Script');
                    sessionStorage.removeItem(numScript + "_" + getPageID());

                    cleanSessionStorage();
                    insertClassToJourneyList()
                    searchSmallSizes();
                    let intervalSmallSizes = setInterval(searchSmallSizes, 650);
                }
                else if (maxIntents == 75) {
                    console.warn(numScript, "Element does not loaded");
                }
                else {
                    maxIntents++;
                    preload(maxIntents);
                }
            }, 300);
        }

        const insertClassToJourneyList = () => {
            messages('insertClassToJourneyList');
            if (document.querySelector("div.journey-select_list")) {
                const elems = document.querySelectorAll("div.journey-select_list");
                for (const elem of elems) {
                    if (!elem.classList.contains('FB310')) {
                        elem.classList.add("FB310")
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        const cleanSessionStorage = () => {
            messages('cleanSessionStorage');
            if (sessionStorage.getItem(numScript + "_availability-ns-ob") != null) {
                sessionStorage.removeItem(numScript + "_availability-ns-ob")
            }
            if (sessionStorage.getItem(numScript + "_availability-ns-ib") != null) {
                sessionStorage.removeItem(numScript + "_availability-ns-ib")
            }
        }

        const setSessionStorageInfo = (sizeSelected) => {
            messages('setSessionStorageInfo sizeSelected:' + sizeSelected);
            if (document.querySelector('html[cro-pag="availability-ns-ob"]')) {
                sessionStorage.setItem("availability-ns-ob-size-seleted", sizeSelected)
            }
            else if (document.querySelector('html[cro-pag="availability-ns-ib"]')) {
                sessionStorage.setItem("availability-ns-ib-size-seleted", sizeSelected)
            }
        }

        const validateFare = (cardToValidate, fareToValidate, fareToUpsell) => {
            messages('validateFare');

            let result = false;
            if (cardToValidate &&
                !cardToValidate.classList.contains('cro-reviewed') &&
                document.querySelector('div[aria-label="Click to select ' + fareToValidate + ' fare"]') &&
                !document.querySelector('div[aria-label="Click to select ' + fareToValidate + ' fare"]').classList.contains("only-" + fareToValidate) &&
                fareToUpsell) {

                result = true;
            }

            return result;
        }

        let contadorDos = 0;


        const validateDesktop = () => {
            return device == "des" ? true : false
        }

        let ibTracked = false;
        let obTracked = false;

        const searchSmallSizes = () => {

            let previosPage = getPageID();

            if (!obTracked && getPageID() == "availability-ns-ob") {
                trackEvents('visitantes_' + getPageID() + '_' + tripType());
                obTracked = true;
                ibTracked = false;
            } else if (!ibTracked && getPageID() == "availability-ns-ib") {
                trackEvents('visitantes_' + getPageID() + '_' + tripType());
                ibTracked = true;
                obTracked = false;
                // cleanSessionStorage();
            } else if (document.querySelector('html[cro-pag="availability-ns-conf"]')) {
                cleanSessionStorage();

                const classicFare = getFareCard('classic');
                const flexFare = getFareCard('flex');
                const businessFare = getBusinessCard('business');

                if (validateFare(basicFare, 'basic', classicFare) == true) {
                    messages("Exists S Button");
                    if (validateDesktop() == true) {
                        cloneCard(basicFare, 'basic');
                        sizeSelected(basicFare, "basic")
                    }
                    else {
                        sizeSelected(basicFare, "basic")
                    }
                } else {
                    // console.log("basic no clona")
                }
                if (validateFare(lightFare, 'light', classicFare) == true) {

                    if (validateDesktop() == true) {
                        cloneCard(lightFare, 'light');
                        sizeSelected(lightFare, "light")
                    }
                    else {
                        sizeSelected(lightFare, "light")
                    }
                } else {
                    // console.log("light no clona")
                }
                if (validateFare(classicFare, 'classic', flexFare) == true) {
                    messages("Exists M Button");
                    if (validateDesktop() == true) {
                        cloneCard(classicFare, 'classic');
                        sizeSelected(classicFare, "classic")
                    }
                    else {
                        sizeSelectedmFare(classicFare, "classic")
                    }
                }
                else {
                    // console.log("classic no clona")
                }
                if (validateFare(flexFare, 'flex', businessFare) == true) {

                }

        const validateAccesibilidad = (tagAccesibilidad) => {

        }

        const asignDocumentKeyUp = (selectors) => {

            let focusedIndex = 0;

            const handleKeyDown = (event) => {
                if (event.key === 'Tab') {
                    event.preventDefault();
                    const elements = document.querySelectorAll(selectors.join(', '));

                    if (elements.length > 0) {
                        elements[focusedIndex].classList.remove('on_focus');
                        focusedIndex = (focusedIndex + 1) % elements.length;
                        elements[focusedIndex].classList.add('on_focus');
                    }
                } else if ((event.key === 'Enter' || event.code === 'Space') && document.querySelector(`.on_focus`)) {
                    document.querySelector(`.on_focus`).click();
                    document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
                }
            };

            const checkDivFB310 = () => {
                const divFB310 = document.querySelector('div#FB310');
                if (!divFB310) {
                    document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
                }
            };

            document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
            setInterval(checkDivFB310, 1000);

            document.addEventListener('keyup', (event) => {
                if (event.key === 'Tab') {
                    const elements = document.querySelectorAll(selectors.join(', '));
                    elements.forEach((element, index) => {
                        element.classList.toggle('on_focus', index === focusedIndex);
                    });
                }
            });
        }

                } else {
                    trackEvents("upselling-" + fareSelected.toUpperCase() + "-to-" + sizesToUpsell[fareSelected.toLowerCase()] + "-close-using-background-keyboard-escape");
                    validateAccesibilidad("key_escape_modal")

        let noShowed = false;

        const createNewHeader = (priceCardSelected, fareSelected, cardSelected) => {

            let textTitle = getTitle(fareSelected);
            const priceSizeToUpsell = cleanPrice(getNextCard(cardSelected).querySelector('.fare_footer span.price').textContent);
            const priceSizeSelected = cleanPrice(priceCardSelected);
            price = (priceSizeToUpsell) - priceSizeSelected;
            price = getPriceByCountry(price);

            const cuarentaPorciento = priceSizeSelected * 0.4;

            if (diferencia >= cuarentaPorciento && !obRejected) {

            }

        const formatNumber = (numero) => {

            let numeroFlotante, numeroFormateado;


            if (getLang() == 'es') {

                if (getCountry() == 'co') {
                    numeroFormateado = numero;
                }
                else if (getCountry() == 'br') {
                    numeroFormateado = numero;
                }
                else {
                    const partes = numero.split(".");
                    const parteEntera = partes[0];
                    const parteDecimal = partes[1] || "00";
                    numeroFormateado = "";

                    // Formatear parte entera con separador de miles por puntos
                    let contador = 0;
                    for (let i = parteEntera.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
                        numeroFormateado = parteEntera[i] + numeroFormateado;
                        contador++;
                        if (contador % 3 === 0 && i !== 0) {
                            numeroFormateado = "." + numeroFormateado;
                        }
                    }

                    // Agregar decimales separados por coma
                    numeroFormateado += "," + parteDecimal;

                    // console.log(numScript, ' -2- formatNumber: ' , numeroFormateado )
                }
            }
            else if (getLang() == 'en') {

                if (getCountry() == 'co') {
                    numeroFormateado = swapDotsAndCommas(numero);
                }
                else if (getCountry() == 'br') {
                    numeroFormateado = swapDotsAndCommas(numero);
                }
                else {
                    // Convertir el número en cadena a un número de punto flotante
                    numeroFlotante = parseFloat(numero);

                    // Verificar si el número es válido
                    if (isNaN(numeroFlotante)) {
                        return "Número inválido";
                    }

                    // Obtener la parte entera del número
                    const parteEntera = Math.floor(numeroFlotante);

                    // Obtener la parte decimal del número
                    const parteDecimal = (numeroFlotante % 1).toFixed(2).substring(1);

                    // Convertir la parte entera en una cadena y agregar comas para separar las unidades de miles
                    const parteEnteraFormateada = parteEntera.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",");

                    // Combinar la parte entera y la parte decimal formateadas
                    numeroFormateado = parteEnteraFormateada + parteDecimal;
                    // console.log(numScript, ' -3- formatNumber: ' , numeroFormateado )
                }
                // console.log(numScript, 'numeroFormateado: ' , numeroFormateado )
            }

            return numeroFormateado;
        }


        const swapDotsAndCommas = (number) => {
            let result = '';

            for (let i = 0; i < number.length; i++) {
                if (number[i] === '.') {
                    result += ',';
                } else if (number[i] === ',') {
                    result += '.';
                } else {
                    result += number[i];
                }
            }

            return result;
        }


        const createListElems = (size, journey) => {

                classData: "cro-container-list",
            });

            const services = copys[getLang()].listServices[size];
            // console.log(size)
            // console.log(services)
            let i = 0;
            for (const service of services) {
                const icon = createNewElem({
                    classData: "cro-service-icon " + service['iconService'],
                });
                const text = createNewElem({
                    classData: "cro-text-list",
                    textContentData: service['service'],
                });
                let serviceType = service["type"];
                if (serviceType && serviceType == "menu") {
                    let menuInclusion = validateMenuInclusion(journey)
                    if (menuInclusion) {
                        if (menuInclusion.conection) {
                            text.textContent += " (" + menuInclusion.IATAdeparture + " - " + menuInclusion.IATAarrival + ")";
                        }
                    }
                }
                const row = createNewElem({
                    classData: "cro-row cro-" + i + "-row",
                    appendElemsData: [icon, text]
                });

                containerListElems.appendChild(row);
                i++;
            }
            return containerListElems;
        }

        const airportsBrasil = ["GIG", "GRU", "RIO", "SAO", "CNF", "BHZ", "MAO"]

        const europAirports = ['MAD', 'BCN', 'LHR', 'LON'];

        const validateMenuInclusion = (fly) => {
            const conections = getConnections(fly);
            let flighWithConections
            if (conections.length == 1) {
                flighWithConections = false;
            } else if (conections.length > 1) {
                flighWithConections = true;
            }

            for (conection of conections) {
                const departure = getDeparture(conection);
                const arrival = getArrival(conection);
                if (validateDepartureArrival(departure, arrival) == true) {
                    return {
                        value: true,
                        conection: flighWithConections,
                        IATAdeparture: departure,
                        IATAarrival: arrival,
                    }
                }
            }
            return false;
        }

        const airports = ['MAD', 'BCN', 'LHR', 'CDG', "LON"];

        const getConnections = (fly) => {
            return fly.querySelectorAll('ul.connections_journeys_group');
        }

            return conection.querySelectorAll('li.connections_journeys_group_item.connections_journey .station-code')[0].textContent
        }

        const getArrival = (conection) => {
            return conection.querySelectorAll('li.connections_journeys_group_item.connections_journey .station-code')[1].textContent
        }

        const validateDepartureArrival = (departure, arrival) => {
            return airports.includes(departure) || airports.includes(arrival);
        }

            if (copys.toLowerCase() == "basic") {
                if (airportsBrasil.includes(origen1) || europAirports.includes(origen1) ||

        }

        const cleanPrice = (oldPrice) => {

            messages('-------------------------------');
            messages('oldPrice: ' + oldPrice);

            // EJEMPLO: En ES => -->>   1.625  ,71
            if (getLang() == 'es') {
                newPrice = oldPrice.split(" ").join("")
                    .split(".").join("")
                    .split(",").join(".");

                messages(' ESPANOL -------------------------------');
                messages('newPrice: ' + newPrice);
            }
            // En EN => -->>   1,419  .00
            if (getLang() == 'en') {
                newPrice = oldPrice.split(" ").join("")
                    .split(",").join("");

                messages(' INGLES -------------------------------');
                messages('newPrice: ' + newPrice);
            }

            return parseFloat(newPrice);
        }

        const getPriceByCountry = (price) => {
            messages('getPriceByCountry');
            let country = getCountry();
            switch (country) {
                case 'co':
                    price = price.toLocaleString("de-DE");
                    break;
                case 'ar':
                    price = price.toLocaleString("de-DE", {
                        minimumFractionDigits: 2,
                        maximumFractionDigits: 2
                    });
                    break;
                case 'br':
                    price = price.toLocaleString("de-DE", {
                        minimumFractionDigits: 2,
                        maximumFractionDigits: 2
                    });
                    break;
                default:
                    // EUROPA usa este formato, los demas los dejo por documentacion para cuando toque
                    price = price.toFixed(2);
                    break;
            }
            // console.log('PRICE');
            // console.log(price)
            return price;
        }
        const createNewUpsellinButton = (sizeClass) => {
            const button = createNewElem({
                classData: 'cro-button cro-accept-upsell-button',

            return button;
        }
        const getPrice = (originalButton) => {
            if (originalButton.querySelector(".fare_footer span.price")) {

            for (const elem of elems) {
                elem.remove();
            }
        }

        const tripType = () => {
            return urlParams.get("origin2") ? "RT" : "OW";
        };

        const getLang = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("lang").split("-")[0].toLowerCase();
        }
        const getPageID = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pag");
        }
        const getCountry = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pos").split("-")[0].toLowerCase();;
        }
        const createNewElem = (data) => {
            const newElem = document.createElement('div');

            if (data['idData']) newElem.setAttribute('id', data['idData']);
            if (data['classData']) newElem.setAttribute('class', data['classData']);
            if (data['textContentData']) newElem.textContent = data['textContentData'];
            if (data['innerHtmlData']) newElem.innerHTML = data['innerHtmlData'];
            if (data['appendElemsData']) for (const elem of data['appendElemsData']) { newElem.appendChild(elem) }

            return newElem;
        }
        const trackEvents = (identificador) => {
            const pushClickanalitycs = e => { let t = "AT_603813_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " ANALITYCS: ", t), window[analitycsElem].push({ event: "sendTargetEvent", target_action: t }) }, trackEvent = (e, t) => { let a = "AT_603813_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " MBOX: ", a), adobe.target.getOffer({ mbox: a, type: type, params: { ATFunctionName: "adobe.target.getOffer", campaignId: "603813", "audienceReport_603813": !1 }, success: () => { "function" == typeof t && t() }, error: (e, t) => { console.error("conv -> trackEvent Request failed", e, t) } }) };
            try { pushClickanalitycs(identificador) } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to analitycs: ", error); }
        }

        const messages = (message) => {
            // console.log(numScript, message);
        }

        if (device == "des")
            preload(0);
    })();
</script>

<style>
    html[cro-pag="availability-ns-ib"] .trip-summary.trip-summary-heading-created,
    html[cro-pag="availability-ns-ob"] .trip-summary.trip-summary-heading-created {
        display: none;
    }

    html[cro-pag="availability-ns-conf"] .trip-summary.trip-summary-heading-created {
        display: flex;
    }
    
    h2.trip-summary.trip-summary-heading-created {
        color: #1B1B1B;
        font-size: 28px;
        font-style: normal;
        font-weight: 700;
        line-height: normal;
        margin: 0 0 2rem 0;
    }

    @media screen and (min-width: 1025px) {}

    @media screen and (max-width: 1024px) {}

    @media screen and (max-width: 767px) {}

    @media screen and (max-width: 500px) {}
</style>
<script>

    (function () {
        let device = document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth >= 1025 ? 'des' : 'mob';
        const type = "0"; // | "0_control";
        const visualizacion = "vis";
        const interaccion = "int";

        const flujo = "NBF"; // DX
        const analitycsElem = (flujo == "NBF" ? "dataLayer" : "gtmDt");
        const numScript = "[FB344]";
        console.log(numScript)

        const copys = {
            es: {
                texto: "Resumen de viaje"
            },
            en: {
                texto: "Trip summary"
            },
            pt: {
                texto: "Resumo da viagem"
            },
            fr: {
                texto: "Résumé du voyage"
            },
        }

        const preload = (maxIntents) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (document.querySelector('.journey-select_container')) {
                    executeChanges();
                }
                else if (maxIntents == 75) {
                    console.warn(numScript, "Elem didn't load");
                }
                else {
                    maxIntents++;
                    preload(maxIntents);
                }
            }, 300);
        }

        const executeChanges = () => {
            let intervalo = setInterval(() => {
                let page = getPageID();
                if (page && page.includes("availability-ns-conf") && !document.querySelector(".trip-summary.trip-summary-heading-created")) {
                    let heading = document.createElement("H2");
                    heading.className = "trip-summary trip-summary-heading-created";
                    heading.textContent = copys[getLang()].texto;
                    var elementoExistente = document.querySelector('journey-availability-select-container');
                    var padre = elementoExistente.parentNode;
                    padre.insertBefore(heading, elementoExistente);
                    clearInterval(intervalo);
                }
            }, 1000);
        }

        const useFullstory = () => {
            if (typeof FS !== 'undefined') {
                FS.event('AT_528987', {
                    campaignId: '528987',
                    campaignRecipeId: '0',
                    offerId: '2051107'
                })
            }
        }

        const getLang = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("lang").toLowerCase();
        }

        const getPageID = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pag");
        }


        const getPos = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pos");
        }

        const trackEvents = (identificador) => {
            const pushClickanalitycs = e => { let t = "AT_528987_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " ANALITYCS: ", t), window[analitycsElem].push({ event: "sendTargetEvent", target_action: t }) }, trackEvent = (e, t) => { let a = "AT_528987_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " MBOX: ", a), adobe.target.getOffer({ mbox: a, type: type, params: { ATFunctionName: "adobe.target.getOffer", campaignId: "528987", "audienceReport_528987": !1 }, success: () => { "function" == typeof t && t() }, error: (e, t) => { console.error("conv -> trackEvent Request failed", e, t) } }) };
            //try { trackEvent(identificador, "click"); } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to adobe: ", error); }
            try { pushClickanalitycs(identificador) } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to analitycs: ", error); }
        }

        if (device == "des" || device == "mob")
            preload(0);

    })();

</script>

<style>
    @media screen and (min-width: 1025px) {}

    @media screen and (max-width: 1024px) {}

    @media screen and (max-width: 767px) {}

    @media screen and (max-width: 500px) {}
</style>
<script>

    (function () {
        let device = document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth >= 992 ? 'des' : 'mob';
        const type = "0"; // | "0_control";
        const visualizacion = "vis";
        const interaccion = "int";

        const flujo = "NBF"; // DX
        const analitycsElem = (flujo == "NBF" ? "dataLayer" : "gtmDt");
        const numScript = "[FB694]";

        console.log(numScript);

        const getLang = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("lang").split("-")[0].toLowerCase();
        }

        const getPageID = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pag");
        }

        const getPos = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pos");
        }

        const trackEvents = (identificador) => {
            const pushClickanalitycs = e => { let t = "AT_580866_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " ANALITYCS: ", t), window[analitycsElem].push({ event: "sendTargetEvent", target_action: t }) }, trackEvent = (e, t) => { let a = "AT_580866_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " MBOX: ", a), adobe.target.getOffer({ mbox: a, type: type, params: { ATFunctionName: "adobe.target.getOffer", campaignId: "580866", "audienceReport_580866": !1 }, success: () => { "function" == typeof t && t() }, error: (e, t) => { console.error("conv -> trackEvent Request failed", e, t) } }) };
            try { trackEvent(identificador, "click"); } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to adobe: ", error); }
            try { pushClickanalitycs(identificador) } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to analitycs: ", error); }
        }

        const preload = (maxIntents) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (document.querySelector('.summary_trigger')) {
                    trackCartButton();
                    trackCartButtonConf();
                    setTimeout(() => {

                        if (getPageID().includes("availability-ns")) {
                            trackAvailability();
                        } else if (getPageID() == "passenger-ns-pax") {
                            trackEvents("Pasajeros_visitor");
                        } else if (getPageID() == "ancillary-ns-aas") {
                            trackEvents("Servicios_visitor");
                        } else if (getPageID() == "passenger-ns-seatmap") {
                            trackEvents("Seatmap_visitor");
                        } else if (getPageID() == "passenger-ns-payment") {
                            trackEvents("Pagos_visitor");
                        }

                    }, 2000);


                }
                else if (maxIntents == 75) {
                    console.warn(numScript, "Elem didn't load");
                }
                else {
                    maxIntents++;
                    preload(maxIntents);
                }
            }, 300);
        }

        const trackAvailability = () => {
            let confTracked = false;
            let intervaloConf = setInterval(() => {
                if (getPageID().includes('conf') && !confTracked) {
                    confTracked = true;
                    trackEvents("Availability_conf_visitor");
                }
            }, 1000);
        };

        const trackCartButtonConf = () => {
            let cartButtonConf;
            let intervalosCartConf = setInterval(() => {
                if (getPageID() == "availability-ns-conf") {
                    cartButtonConf = document.querySelector(".summary_trigger");
                    if (cartButtonConf && !cartButtonConf.classList.contains('FB694EventoAñadido')) {
                        cartButtonConf.classList.add('FB694EventoAñadido');

                        cartButtonConf.addEventListener("click", () => {
                            const verDetalle = document.querySelector(".price-breakdown-header")
                            if (verDetalle) {
                                trackEvents("Availability_conf_abre_carrito");
                            } else {
                                trackEvents("Availability_conf_click_carrito");
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }
            }, 2000);
        }


        const trackCartButton = () => {

            let intervaloValidarBotones = setInterval(() => {
                const cartButton = document.querySelector(".summary_trigger");
                const verDetalle = document.querySelector(".price-breakdown-header")
                const cerrarCart = document.querySelector(".summary_close_btn")
                const backgroundCart = document.querySelector(".ui-overlay")

                if (!getPageID().includes('availability') && cartButton && !cartButton.classList.contains('FB694EventoAñadido')) {
                    cartButton.classList.add("FB694EventoAñadido");
                    cartButton.addEventListener("click", () => {
                        const comprobarDetalle = document.querySelector(".price-breakdown-header")
                        if (comprobarDetalle) {
                            if (getPageID() == "passenger-ns-pax") {
                                trackEvents("Pasajeros_abre_carrito");
                            } else if (getPageID() == "ancillary-ns-aas") {
                                trackEvents("Servicios_abre_carrito");
                            } else if (getPageID() == "passenger-ns-seatmap") {
                                trackEvents("Seatmap_abre_carrito");
                            }
                        } else {
                            if (getPageID() == "passenger-ns-pax") {
                                trackEvents("Pasajeros_click_carrito");
                            } else if (getPageID() == "ancillary-ns-aas") {
                                trackEvents("Servicios_click_carrito");
                            } else if (getPageID() == "passenger-ns-seatmap") {
                                trackEvents("Seatmap_click_carrito");
                            }
                        }
                    });
                }

                if (verDetalle && !verDetalle.classList.contains("FB694EventoAñadido")) {
                    verDetalle.classList.add("FB694EventoAñadido");
                    verDetalle.addEventListener("click", () => {
                        if (getPageID().includes("conf")) {
                            trackEvents("Availability_conf_click_ver_detalles");
                        } else if (getPageID() == "passenger-ns-pax") {
                            trackEvents("Pasajeros_click_ver_detalles");
                        } else if (getPageID() == "ancillary-ns-aas") {
                            trackEvents("Servicios_click_ver_detalles");
                        } else if (getPageID() == "passenger-ns-seatmap") {
                            trackEvents("Seatmap_click_ver_detalles");
                        } else if (getPageID() == "passenger-ns-payment") {
                            trackEvents("Pagos_click_ver_detalles");
                        }
                    });
                }

                if (cerrarCart && !cerrarCart.classList.contains("FB694EventoAñadido")) {
                    cerrarCart.classList.add("FB694EventoAñadido");
                    cerrarCart.addEventListener("click", () => {

                        if (getPageID().includes("conf")) {
                            trackEvents("Availability_conf_click_cerrar");

                        } else if (getPageID() == "passenger-ns-pax") {
                            trackEvents("Pasajeros_click_cerrar");
                        } else if (getPageID() == "ancillary-ns-aas") {
                            trackEvents("Servicios_click_cerrar");
                        } else if (getPageID() == "passenger-ns-seatmap") {
                            trackEvents("Seatmap_click_cerrar");
                        }
                        sessionStorage.setItem('clickCarrito', "false");
                    });
                }

                if (backgroundCart && !backgroundCart.classList.contains("FB694EventoAñadido")) {
                    backgroundCart.classList.add("FB694EventoAñadido");
                    backgroundCart.addEventListener("click", () => {

                        if (getPageID().includes("conf")) {
                            trackEvents("Availability_conf_click_background");
                        } else if (getPageID() == "passenger-ns-pax") {
                            trackEvents("Pasajeros_click_background");
                        } else if (getPageID() == "ancillary-ns-aas") {
                            trackEvents("Servicios_click_background");
                        } else if (getPageID() == "passenger-ns-seatmap") {
                            trackEvents("Seatmap_click_background");
                        }
                        sessionStorage.setItem('clickCarrito', "false");
                    });
                }

            }, 1000);
        }

        if (device == "des")
            preload(0);

    })();

</script>

<style>
    journey-schedule-custom .journey-schedule_container:has(.clic-logo, .avianca-logo) {
        display: flex;
    }

    .journey-schedule_carriers.ng-star-inserted {
        display: flex;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        flex-direction: column !important;
        max-width: 134px;
        margin: 0 auto !important;

    }

    .journey-schedule_carriers_items {
        justify-content: center;
    }

    .operado-por-avianca-clic-terminal-2,
    .operado-por-avianca-clic-terminal-el-dorado,
    .operado-por-avianca-clic-terminal-2-y-el-dorado {

        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;

    }

        align-items: center;

        background-size: contain;

        margin-top: 4px;

        background-size: contain;
        /* padding: 12px; */

        margin: 0 auto;
        width: 85px;
        height: 1.375rem
    }



    html[cro-pag="availability-ns-conf"] .cintilla-clic-terminal-2 {

    }

    }

    @media (min-width: 767px) {

        }


        .journey-selected[_ngcontent-cxw-c12] .journey[_ngcontent-cxw-c12] {

    .FB837-PositionRelative {

    }

    }

    .FB837-Message {
        position: relative;
        top: 75px;

        justify-content: center;

    }

        const flujo = "NBF"; // DX
