        const numScript = "[FB837]";
        console.log(numScript)

        let clicT1 = Array.from(Array(999)).map((_, i) => 'AV' + (i + 2000).toString());


        let masterArray = [,];

        const preload = (maxIntents) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (document.querySelector('.journey-select_list')) {
                    modifyPage();
                    VerifyCards()
                }
                else if (maxIntents == 75) {
                    console.warn(numScript, "Elem didn't load");
                }
                else {
                    maxIntents++;
                    preload(maxIntents);
                }
            }, 300);
        }

        let agregaMargen;

        const modifyPage = () => {
            setInterval(() => {
                VerifyCards()
                if (existeAlgunAtr() == true) {

                    const allFlights = document.querySelectorAll('div.journey-control');

                    for (const flight of allFlights) {

                        agregaMargen = false;

                        if (flight.querySelector(".journey-schedule_carriers.ng-star-inserted")) {


                            const priceCurrencyNode = flight.querySelector(".journey-selected .journey_journey-schedule .journey-schedule_carriers.ng-star-inserted");

                            if (priceCurrencyNode) {
                                priceCurrencyNode.classList.add("aplicaTop"); // Aplica el margen superior
                            }

                            agregaMargen = true;

                        }

                        const frecuencias = flight.querySelectorAll('div.connections_journeys ul.connections_journeys_group');

                        if (frecuencias.length < 2 && !flight.classList.contains('clic-checked')) {

                            let hasBog = false;
                            let isATR = false;
                            let isClic = false;
                            let isClicExpres = false;
                            let isAvianca = false;

                            const stationCode = Array.from(flight.querySelectorAll('ul span.station-code'), el => el.textContent);//Tiene BOG
                            const transportCabin = Array.from(flight.querySelectorAll('ul span.transport-cabin'), el => el.textContent.split(' ')[0]);//si es Atr
                            const transportCode = Array.from(flight.querySelectorAll('ul span.transport-code'), el => el.textContent);//codigo del vuelo
                            const transportCabinElem = Array.from(flight.querySelectorAll('ul span.transport-cabin'), el => el);//

                            hasBog = true;

                            if (transportCabin.includes("ATR")) {  //con que alguno tenga ATR devuelve true
                                isATR = true;

                                if (clicT1.includes(transportCode[0])) {//si el codigo del vuelo es de 2900 a 2999 es clic solito
                                    isClic = true;
                                    createHover(flight);
                                    /*operadoPorClic(flight);
                                    setTimeout(() => {
                                        createCintilla();
                                    }, 1000);*/
                                } else {
                                    isClicExpres = true;

                                    createHover(flight);
                                    /*setTimeout(() => {
                                        createCintilla();
                                    }, 1000);
                                    operadoPorClicAviancaExpres(flight);*/
                                }

                            } else if (transportCabin[0].includes("AIRBUS") && !transportCabinElem[0].parentElement.querySelector(".transport-carrier")) {
                                if (!isAvianca) {
                                    isAvianca = true;
                                    //addOperadoPorAvianca(flight);

                                }
                            }
                        }
                        else if (frecuencias.length >= 2 && !flight.classList.contains('clic-checked')) {

                            let hasBog = false;
                            let isATR = false;
                            let isClic = false;
                            let isClicExpres = false;
                            let isAvianca = false;

                            const stationCode = Array.from(flight.querySelectorAll('ul span.station-code'), el => el.textContent);//Tiene BOG
                            const transportCabin = Array.from(flight.querySelectorAll('ul span.transport-cabin'), el => el.textContent.split(' ')[0]);//si es Atr
                            const transportCabinElem = Array.from(flight.querySelectorAll('ul span.transport-cabin'), el => el);

                            let nodoTraspor = flight.querySelectorAll('ul span.transport-cabin');

                            const transportCode = Array.from(flight.querySelectorAll('ul span.transport-code'), el => el.textContent);//codigo del vuelo

                            let validaUsoUnaVezHover = false;

                            for (let i = 0; i < stationCode.length; i += 2) {
                                /*
                                    if (stationCode[i] == 'BOG') {//verifica que tenga escala o origen
                                    */
                                hasBog = true;

                                let value = i > 0 ? i / 2 : 0;

                                if (transportCabin[value].includes("ATR")) {  //con que alguno tenga ATR devuelve true

                                    isATR = true;
                                    if (clicT1.includes(transportCode[value])) {//si el codigo del vuelo es de 2900 a 2999 es clic solito

                                        if (!isClic) { //valida que solo cree el logo una vez
                                            isClic = true;

                                            if (!validaUsoUnaVezHover) {
                                                validaUsoUnaVezHover = true;
                                                createHover(flight);
                                            }
                                            /*setTimeout(() => {
                                                createCintilla();
                                            }, 1000);
                                            operadoPorClic(flight);*/
                                        }
                                    } else {
                                        if (!isClicExpres) {
                                            isClicExpres = true;
                                            if (!validaUsoUnaVezHover) {
                                                validaUsoUnaVezHover = true;
                                                createHover(flight);
                                            }
                                            /*setTimeout(() => {
                                                createCintilla();
                                            }, 1000);
                                            operadoPorClicAviancaExpres(flight);*/
                                        }

                                    }

                                } else if (transportCabin[value].includes("AIRBUS") && !transportCabinElem[value].parentElement.querySelector(".transport-carrier")) {
                                    if (!isAvianca) {
                                        isAvianca = true;
                                        //addOperadoPorAvianca(flight);
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                        }
                        flight.classList.add('clic-checked')
                    }
                }
            }, 1000);
        }

        const existeAlgunAtr = () => {
            const allAirplanes = document.querySelectorAll('.transport-cabin');
            let result = false;
            for (const plane of allAirplanes) {
                if (plane.textContent.includes('ATR') == true) {
                    result = true;
                }
            }
            return result
        }

        const addOperadoPorAvianca = (flight) => {
            const padreContainer = flight.querySelector('.journey-schedule_container');
            let existeTextoOperadoPor;

            if (getLang() == "pt") {
                if (padreContainer) {
                    existeTextoOperadoPor = [...padreContainer.querySelectorAll('*')].some(el =>
                        el.textContent.includes("Operado por") || el.textContent.includes("Operado pela")
                    );
                }

            } else {
                if (padreContainer) {
                    existeTextoOperadoPor = [...padreContainer.querySelectorAll('*')].some(el => el.textContent.includes(copys[getLang()].textoTitulo));
                }
            }

            const containerPrincipal = document.createElement('div')
            containerPrincipal.classList.add("operado-por-avianca");

            if (!agregaMargen) {
                containerPrincipal.classList.add("marginTop");
                agregaMargen = true;
            }


            const container = document.createElement("div")
            container.classList.add("container-clic")

            const texto = document.createElement("div")
            texto.textContent = copys[getLang()].textoTitulo
            texto.classList.add("operado-por-clic-texto")

            const logoAvianca = document.createElement("div");
            logoAvianca.classList.add("avianca-logo")

            if (!existeTextoOperadoPor) {
                container.appendChild(texto)
            }

            container.appendChild(logoAvianca)
            containerPrincipal.appendChild(container)

            const contenedorVuelo = flight.querySelector(".journey-schedule_container");

            const hijosInfoVuelo = padreContainer.children;

            if (hijosInfoVuelo.length == 1) {

                if (!contenedorVuelo.querySelector(".operado-por-avianca")) {
                    contenedorVuelo.appendChild(containerPrincipal);
                }

            } else if (hijosInfoVuelo.length >= 2) {

                const existeImagen = padreContainer.querySelector('img[src*="avianca-logo-newbrand.svg"]') !== null; //Valida si la pagina ya viene con Logo clic
                if (!existeImagen) {
                    const ultimoItem = hijosInfoVuelo[hijosInfoVuelo.length - 1];
                    ultimoItem.appendChild(containerPrincipal);
                }
            }

        }

        const operadoPorClic = (flight) => {

            const padreContainer = flight.querySelector('.journey-schedule_container');
            let existeTextoOperadoPor;

            if (getLang() == "pt") {
                if (padreContainer) {
                    existeTextoOperadoPor = [...padreContainer.querySelectorAll('*')].some(el =>
                        el.textContent.includes("Operado por") || el.textContent.includes("Operado pela")
                    );
                }

            } else {
                if (padreContainer) {
                    existeTextoOperadoPor = [...padreContainer.querySelectorAll('*')].some(el => el.textContent.includes(copys[getLang()].textoTitulo));
                }
            }

            const containerPrincipal = document.createElement('div')
            containerPrincipal.classList.add("operado-por-clic-terminal-2");

            if (!agregaMargen) {
                containerPrincipal.classList.add("marginTop");
                agregaMargen = true;
            }

            const container = document.createElement("div")
            container.classList.add("container-clic")

            const texto = document.createElement("div")
            texto.textContent = copys[getLang()].textoTitulo
            texto.classList.add("operado-por-clic-texto")

            const logoClic = document.createElement("div");
            logoClic.classList.add("clic-logo")

            if (!existeTextoOperadoPor) {
                container.appendChild(texto)
            }

            container.appendChild(logoClic);
            containerPrincipal.appendChild(container)

            const contenedorVuelo = flight.querySelector(".journey-schedule_container");

            const hijosInfoVuelo = padreContainer.children;

            if (hijosInfoVuelo.length == 1) {

                if (!contenedorVuelo.querySelector(".operado-por-clic-terminal-el-dorado")) {
                    contenedorVuelo.appendChild(containerPrincipal);
                }

            } else if (hijosInfoVuelo.length >= 2) {

                const existeImagen = padreContainer.querySelector('img[src*="clic.svg"]') !== null; //Valida si la pagina ya viene con Logo clic

                if (!existeImagen) {
                    const ultimoItem = hijosInfoVuelo[hijosInfoVuelo.length - 1];
                    ultimoItem.appendChild(containerPrincipal);
                }
            }
        }


        const operadoPorClicAviancaExpres = (flight) => {

            const padreContainer = flight.querySelector('.journey-schedule_container');
            let existeTextoOperadoPor;

            /*
            de esta manera validamos si agregamos la palabra "operado por" o si ya la tiene, tenemos que 
            hacer un exepcion con pt dado que no se puede validar con getLang sino se debe validar quemado
            */
            if (getLang() == "pt") {
                if (padreContainer) {
                    existeTextoOperadoPor = [...padreContainer.querySelectorAll('*')].some(el =>
                        el.textContent.includes("Operado por") || el.textContent.includes("Operado pela")
                    );
                }

            } else {
                if (padreContainer) {
                    existeTextoOperadoPor = [...padreContainer.querySelectorAll('*')].some(el => el.textContent.includes(copys[getLang()].textoTitulo));
                }
            }

            const containerPrincipal = document.createElement('div')
            containerPrincipal.classList.add("operado-por-clic-terminal-el-dorado");

            if (!agregaMargen) {
                containerPrincipal.classList.add("marginTop");
                agregaMargen = true;
            }

            const container = document.createElement("div")
            container.classList.add("container-clic")


            const texto = document.createElement("div");
            texto.textContent = copys[getLang()].textoTitulo
            texto.classList.add("operado-por-clic-texto")

            const logoClic = document.createElement("div");
            logoClic.classList.add("clic-logo")

            const textoAvExpress = document.createElement("div")
            textoAvExpress.textContent = copys[getLang()].textoComplementario
            textoAvExpress.classList.add("operado-por-clic-av-express")

            if (!existeTextoOperadoPor) {
                container.appendChild(texto)
            }
            container.appendChild(logoClic)
            container.appendChild(textoAvExpress)

            containerPrincipal.appendChild(container)

            const contenedorVuelo = flight.querySelector(".journey-schedule_container");

            const hijosInfoVuelo = padreContainer.children;

            if (hijosInfoVuelo.length == 1) {

                if (!contenedorVuelo.querySelector(".operado-por-clic-terminal-el-dorado")) {
                    contenedorVuelo.appendChild(containerPrincipal);
                }

            } else if (hijosInfoVuelo.length >= 2) {

                const ultimoItem = hijosInfoVuelo[hijosInfoVuelo.length - 1];
                ultimoItem.appendChild(containerPrincipal);

            }

        }

        const createCintilla = () => {


            if (document.querySelector(".journey-selector_header_route")) {
                if (!document.querySelector(".cintilla-clic-terminal-2")) {

                    const containerCintilla = document.createElement("div");
                    containerCintilla.classList.add("cintilla-clic-terminal-2");

                    const containerImg = document.createElement("div");
                    containerImg.classList.add('icon-cintilla-clic');

                    const containerTexto = document.createElement("div");
                    containerTexto.classList.add("text-cintilla-clic")

                    const parrafoCont = document.createElement("p");

                    parrafoCont.innerHTML = copys[getLang()].textoCintilla;

                    containerCintilla.appendChild(containerImg);
                    containerCintilla.appendChild(containerTexto)
                    containerTexto.appendChild(parrafoCont);

                    const outboundJourney = document.querySelector(".journey-selector.journey-selector-outbound");
                    const firstChild = outboundJourney.firstChild;

                    if (!document.querySelector('.cintilla-clic-terminal-2'))
                        outboundJourney.insertBefore(containerCintilla, firstChild);
                }
            }

        }

        const createHover = (flight) => {
            let transportCodes = flight.querySelectorAll(".connections_data .transport-code");
            for (let transportCode of transportCodes) {
                let planeType = transportCode.parentElement.querySelector(".transport-cabin");
                let clicLogo = transportCode.parentElement.querySelector(".clic-logo");
                // if ((clicT1.includes(transportCode.textContent.trim())) /*&& !flight.querySelector("ul .clic-logo")*/) {
                if (planeType && planeType.textContent.toLowerCase().includes("atr") && !clicLogo) {
                    let lista = transportCode.parentElement;
                    let imagen = document.createElement("div");
                    imagen.classList.add("clic-logo")
                    lista.appendChild(imagen);
                }
            };
        }



        //Metodo que verifica cada una de las tarjetas de vuelo y llena un nombre para despues utilizarlo como key del diccionario 
        const VerifyCards = () => {
            //console.log("fr");

            const internCards = document.querySelectorAll('div.journey-control');
            for (const cards of internCards) {
                if (!cards.classList.contains('FB837-Reviewed')) {
                    cards.classList.add('FB837-Reviewed');

                    let nameObject = '';

                    const stationCode = Array.from(cards.querySelectorAll('ul span.station-code'), el => el.textContent);//Tiene BOG
                    const transportCabin = Array.from(cards.querySelectorAll('ul span.transport-cabin'), el => el.textContent.split(' ')[0]);//si es Atr
                    const transportCode = Array.from(cards.querySelectorAll('ul span.transport-code'), el => el.textContent);//codigo del vielo 


                    let moreThanTwo = cards.querySelectorAll('ul').length > 2 ? true : false;
                    //console.log(moreThanTwo)
                    if (cards.querySelectorAll('ul').length > 1) {
                        if (stationCode[0].includes('BOG')) {
                            nameObject = 'CON-BOG-'
                            if (transportCabin[0].includes('ATR')) {
                                if (clicT1.includes(transportCode[0])) {
                                    nameObject += 'ATR-' + transportCode[0] + '-NOBOG-';
                                }
                                else {
                                    nameObject += 'ATR-NOBOG-';
                                }

                                if (transportCabin[1].includes('ATR')) {
                                    if (clicT1.includes(transportCode[1])) {
                                        nameObject += 'ATR-' + transportCode[1];
                                    }
                                    else {
                                        nameObject += 'ATR';
                                    }
                                }
                                else {
                                    if (moreThanTwo) {
                                        if (transportCabin[2].includes('ATR')) {
                                            if (clicT1.includes(transportCode[2])) {
                                                nameObject += 'ATR-' + transportCode[2];
                                            }
                                            else {
                                                nameObject += 'ATR';
                                            }
                                        }
                                        else {
                                            nameObject += 'AVIANCA'
                                        }
                                    }
                                    else {
                                        nameObject += 'AVIANCA'
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                            else {
                                nameObject += 'AVIANCA-NOBOG-'
                                if (transportCabin[1].includes('ATR')) {
                                    if (clicT1.includes(transportCode[1])) {
                                        nameObject += 'ATR-' + transportCode[1];
                                    }
                                    else {
                                        nameObject += 'ATR';
                                    }
                                }
                                else {
                                    if (moreThanTwo) {
                                        if (transportCabin[2].includes('ATR')) {
                                            if (clicT1.includes(transportCode[2])) {
                                                nameObject += 'ATR-' + transportCode[2];
                                            }
                                            else {
                                                nameObject += 'ATR';
                                            }
                                        }
                                        else {
                                            nameObject += 'AVIANCA'
                                        }
                                    }
                                    else {
                                        nameObject += 'AVIANCA'
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                        }
                        else {
                            nameObject = 'CON-NOBOG-'
                            if (transportCabin[0].includes('ATR')) {
                                if (clicT1.includes(transportCode[0])) {
                                    nameObject += 'ATR-' + transportCode[0] + '-BOG-';
                                }
                                else {
                                    nameObject += 'ATR-BOG-';
                                }

                                if (transportCabin[1].includes('ATR')) {
                                    if (clicT1.includes(transportCode[1])) {
                                        nameObject += 'ATR-' + transportCode[1];
                                    }
                                    else {
                                        nameObject += 'ATR';
                                    }
                                }
                                else {
                                    if (moreThanTwo) {
                                        if (transportCabin[2].includes('ATR')) {
                                            if (clicT1.includes(transportCode[2])) {
                                                nameObject += 'ATR-' + transportCode[2];
                                            }
                                            else {
                                                nameObject += 'ATR';
                                            }
                                        }
                                        else {
                                            nameObject += 'AVIANCA'
                                        }
                                    }
                                    else {
                                        nameObject += 'AVIANCA'
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                            else {
                                nameObject += 'AVIANCA-BOG-'
                                if (transportCabin[1].includes('ATR')) {
                                    if (clicT1.includes(transportCode[1])) {
                                        nameObject += 'ATR-' + transportCode[1];
                                    }
                                    else {
                                        nameObject += 'ATR';
                                    }
                                }
                                else {
                                    if (moreThanTwo) {
                                        if (transportCabin[2].includes('ATR')) {
                                            if (clicT1.includes(transportCode[2])) {
                                                nameObject += 'ATR-' + transportCode[2];
                                            }
                                            else {
                                                nameObject += 'ATR';
                                            }
                                        }
                                        else {
                                            nameObject += 'AVIANCA'
                                        }
                                    }
                                    else {
                                        nameObject += 'AVIANCA'
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    else {
                        if (stationCode[0].includes('BOG')) {
                            nameObject = 'BOG-'
                            if (transportCabin[0].includes('ATR')) {
                                if (clicT1.includes(transportCode[0])) {
                                    nameObject += 'ATR-' + transportCode[0] + '-NOBOG';
                                }
                                else {
                                    nameObject += 'ATR-NOBOG';
                                }
                            } else {
                                nameObject = 'AVIANCA-NOBOG'
                            }
                        }
                        else {
                            nameObject = 'NOBOG-'
                            if (transportCabin[0].includes('ATR')) {
                                if (clicT1.includes(transportCode[0])) {
                                    nameObject += 'ATR-' + transportCode[0] + '-BOG';
                                }
                                else {
                                    nameObject += 'ATR-BOG';
                                }
                            } else {
                                nameObject = 'AVIANCA-BOG'
                            }
                        }
                    }


                    //console.log(nameObject);
                    const message = masterArray[nameObject];//busca en el diccionario el mensaje segun el nombre construido  
                    let fill = false;

                    if (message != '' && message != undefined) {
                        if (message !== copys[getLang()][2] && message !== copys[getLang()][13]) {
                            fill = true;
                        }
                        const parent = cards.querySelector('.journey_journey-schedule');
                        parent.parentElement.classList.add('FB837-ParentCard');
                        CreateMessage(parent, message, fill);//llama un metodo solo si el mensaje existe y crea el mensaje para posicionarlo en la pagina
                    }
                }
            }
            ajustarAlturaMensaje();
        }


        // solo es para ubicar el mesaje
        const ajustarAlturaMensaje = () => {
            const selectedDates = document.querySelectorAll(".journey-selector_selected-date");

            if (selectedDates.length > 0) {
                selectedDates.forEach(item => {
                    // Paso 4: Buscamos los hermanos de cada elemento
                    let sibling = item;
                    // Buscamos hasta encontrar un hermano con un hijo que tenga la clase '.FB837-Message'
                    while (sibling) {
                        sibling = sibling.nextElementSibling; // Obtenemos el siguiente hermano

                        if (sibling && sibling.querySelector('.FB837-Message')) { // Si el hermano tiene un hijo con la clase '.FB837-Message'
                            const messageNode = sibling.querySelector('.FB837-Message'); // Obtenemos el nodo con la clase '.FB837-Message'
                            messageNode.classList.add('newTopMessage'); // Agregamos la clase 'newTopMessage' al nodo con la clase '.FB837-Message'
                            break; // Si solo te interesa el primer hermano que tenga un hijo con clase '.FB837-Message'
                        }
                    }
                });
            }
        }

        const CreateMessage = (parent, message, fill) => {
            const cloneDuration = parent.querySelector('.journey-schedule_duration_time');
            const cloneAction = parent.querySelector('.journey-schedule_connection');

            cloneDuration.classList.add('FB837-PositionDuration');
            cloneAction.classList.add('FB837-PositionAction');
            cloneDuration.parentElement.classList.add('FB837-PositionDurationParent');

            const lineDuration = document.createElement('div');
            lineDuration.classList.add('FB837-LineDuration');

            cloneDuration.parentElement.appendChild(lineDuration);

            const divMessageContent = document.createElement('div');
            const pMessageContent = document.createElement('p');
            divMessageContent.classList.add('FB837-Message');

            if (parent.querySelector('.journey-schedule_carriers')) {
                divMessageContent.classList.add('FB837-MessageWidth');
            }

            pMessageContent.innerHTML = message;
            divMessageContent.appendChild(pMessageContent);
            parent.querySelector('.journey-schedule_container').parentElement.appendChild(divMessageContent);

            if (fill) {
                parent.querySelector('.journey-schedule_container').parentElement.parentElement.classList.add('FB837-TempHeight');
            }

            CheckPositionParent(parent.querySelector('.journey-schedule_container').parentElement);
        }

        const CheckPositionParent = (parent) => {
            if (parent) {
                if (!parent.classList.contains('FB837-PositionRelative')) {
                    parent.classList.add('FB837-PositionRelative');
                }
            }
        }


        const validateFlota = (flota) => {
            return flota.includes('ATR');
        }

        const getLang = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("lang");
        }

        const getPageID = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pag");
        }

        const getPos = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pos");
        }

        const trackEvents = (identificador) => {
            const pushClickanalitycs = e => { let t = "AT_601457_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " ANALITYCS: ", t), window[analitycsElem].push({ event: "sendTargetEvent", target_action: t }) }, trackEvent = (e, t) => { let a = "AT_601457_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " MBOX: ", a), adobe.target.getOffer({ mbox: a, type: type, params: { ATFunctionName: "adobe.target.getOffer", campaignId: "601457", "audienceReport_601457": !1 }, success: () => { "function" == typeof t && t() }, error: (e, t) => { console.error("conv -> trackEvent Request failed", e, t) } }) };
            try { pushClickanalitycs(identificador) } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to analitycs: ", error); }
        }

        masterArray['NOBOG-ATR-BOG'] = copys[getLang()][0];
        masterArray['BOG-ATR-NOBOG'] = copys[getLang()][1];
        masterArray['CON-NOBOG-ATR-BOG-AVIANCA'] = copys[getLang()][4];
        masterArray['CON-NOBOG-AVIANCA-BOG-ATR'] = copys[getLang()][10];
        masterArray['CON-BOG-AVIANCA-NOBOG-ATR'] = copys[getLang()][12];
        masterArray['CON-BOG-ATR-NOBOG-AVIANCA'] = copys[getLang()][14];
        masterArray['CON-NOBOG-ATR-BOG-ATR'] = copys[getLang()][5];
        masterArray['CON-BOG-ATR-NOBOG-ATR'] = copys[getLang()][15];

        for (let c = 0; c < clicT1.length; c++) {
            masterArray['NOBOG-ATR-' + clicT1[c] + '-BOG'] = copys[getLang()][2];
            masterArray['BOG-ATR-' + clicT1[c] + '-NOBOG'] = copys[getLang()][3];
            masterArray['CON-NOBOG-ATR-' + clicT1[c] + '-BOG-AVIANCA'] = copys[getLang()][7];
            masterArray['CON-NOBOG-AVIANCA-BOG-ATR-' + clicT1[c]] = copys[getLang()][11];
            masterArray['CON-BOG-AVIANCA-NOBOG-ATR-' + clicT1[c]] = copys[getLang()][13];
            masterArray['CON-BOG-ATR-NOBOG-ATR-' + clicT1[c]] = copys[getLang()][16];
            masterArray['CON-BOG-ATR-' + clicT1[c] + '-NOBOG-AVIANCA'] = copys[getLang()][17];
            masterArray['CON-NOBOG-ATR-' + clicT1[c] + '-BOG-ATR'] = copys[getLang()][8];
            masterArray['CON-BOG-ATR-' + clicT1[c] + '-NOBOG-ATR'] = copys[getLang()][18];

            for (let b = 0; b < clicT1.length; b++) {
                masterArray['CON-NOBOG-ATR-' + clicT1[c] + '-BOG-ATR-' + clicT1[b]] = copys[getLang()][9];
                masterArray['CON-BOG-ATR-' + clicT1[c] + '-NOBOG-ATR-' + clicT1[b]] = copys[getLang()][19];
            }
            masterArray['CON-NOBOG-ATR-BOG-ATR-' + clicT1[c]] = copys[getLang()][6];
        }

        preload(0);

    })();
</script>

<style>
    .booking-steps {
        display: none;
    }

    .FB367.progess-bar-container {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
        margin-left: auto;
        color: #1B1B1B;
        text-align: center;
        font-family: "Red Hat Display", sans-serif;
        font-size: 16px;
        font-style: normal;
        font-weight: 700;
        gap: 10px;
        margin-bottom: 6px;
        margin-right: 10px;
    }

    .FB367 progress#av-steps[value] {
        -webkit-appearance: none;
        -moz-appearance: none;
        appearance: none;
        border: none;
        width: 124px;
        border-radius: 10em;
        background: #D9D9D9;
        height: 10px;
    }

    .FB367 progress[value]::-webkit-progress-bar {
        border-radius: 10em;
        background: #D9D9D9;
    }

    .FB367 progress[value]::-webkit-progress-value {
        border-radius: 10em;
        background: #23C847;
    }

    .FB367 progress[value]::-moz-progress-bar {
        border-radius: 10em;
        background: #23C847;
    }

    @media only screen and (max-width: 1159px) {
        .FB367.progess-bar-container {
            display: none;
        }
    }
</style>

<script>

    (function () {
        const device =
            document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth >= 1160 ? "des" : "mob";
        const page = document.documentElement.getAttribute("cro-pag");

        const type = "1"; // | "0_control";
        const interaccion = "int";

        const flujo = "NBF"; // DX || NBF
        const analitycsElem = flujo == "NBF" ? "dataLayer" : "gtmDt";

        const numScript = "[FB845]";
        console.log(numScript);

        const progressBarText = {
            es: "Paso 1 de 5",
            en: "Step 1 of 5",
            pt: "Passo 1 de 5",
            fr: "Étape 1 sur 5"
        };

        const createProgressBarStep1 = () => {
            const infoMenu = document.querySelector('.combined_summary_bar-left')

            const container = document.createElement('div')
            const steps = document.createElement('label')
            const progressBar = document.createElement('progress')

            container.classList.add('FB367', 'progess-bar-container')
            steps.classList.add('progress-bar-label')
            progressBar.classList.add('progress-bar-step')

            steps.innerText = progressBarText[getLang()]
            steps.setAttribute('for', 'av-steps')

            progressBar.id = 'av-steps'
            progressBar.setAttribute('max', '5')
            progressBar.setAttribute('value', '1')

            container.appendChild(steps)
            container.appendChild(progressBar)

            infoMenu.appendChild(container)
        }

        const preload = (maxIntents) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (
                    document.querySelector('.combined_summary_bar') &&
                    document.querySelector(".combined_summary_bar-left")
                ) {
                    createProgressBarStep1()
                } else if (maxIntents == 75) {
                    console.warn(numScript, "Elem didn't load");
                } else {
                    maxIntents++;
                    preload(maxIntents);
                }
            }, 300);
        };

        const getLang = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("lang").toLowerCase();
        };

        const trackEvents = (identificador) => {
            const pushClickanalitycs = e => { let t = "AT_601775_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " ANALITYCS: ", t), window[analitycsElem].push({ event: "sendTargetEvent", target_action: t }) }, trackEvent = (e, t) => { let a = "AT_601775_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " MBOX: ", a), adobe.target.getOffer({ mbox: a, type: type, params: { ATFunctionName: "adobe.target.getOffer", campaignId: "601775", "audienceReport_601775": !1 }, success: () => { "function" == typeof t && t() }, error: (e, t) => { console.error("conv -> trackEvent Request failed", e, t) } }) };
            try { pushClickanalitycs(identificador) } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to analitycs: ", error); }
        }

        if (device == "des") preload(0);
    })();


</script>

<style>
    span.journey-schedule_station_code {
        display: block !important;
    }

    @media screen and (min-width: 840px) {

        div.page_buttons {

            gap: 32px;
        }

        .page_button{
            margin-left: 0px;
        }

        .FB219.swat-container {
            width: auto !important;
            position: static !important;
            transform: none;
        }

        .FB219.swat-container .swat-title {
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: 400;
            font-size: 16px;
            line-height: 19px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            text-align: right;
            color: #1B1B1B;
            /* font-family: 'Lato regular'; */

        }

        .FB219.swat-container .swat-footer,
        .FB219.swat-container .swat-currency,
        .FB219.swat-container .swat-price {
            width: max-content;
            display: inline-flex;

            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: 700;
            font-size: 24px;

            width: max-content;

        }

        html[cro-pag="availability-ns-conf"][lang='es'] .journey-control.journey-selected .journey:before,
        html[cro-pag="availability-ns-ib"][lang='es'] .journey-control.journey-selected .journey:before {

            position: absolute;

            height: 30px;

            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            color: white;
            font-family: 'Material Symbols Outlined', sans-serif;
            justify-content: left;
            color: white;
            z-index: 1000;
            padding-left: 10px;
        }

        html[cro-pag="availability-ns-conf"][lang='en'] .journey-control.journey-selected .journey:after,

<script>


    (function () {

        const type = "1"; // | "0_control";
        const visualizacion = "vis";
        const interaccion = "int"


        let device = document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth >= 839 ? 'des' : 'mob';

        const flujo = "NBF"; // DX
        const analitycsElem = (flujo == "NBF" ? "dataLayer" : "gtmDt");

        const numScript = "[FB725]";

        console.log(numScript);

        const copys = {
            es: "Total de la reserva:",
            en: "Booking total:",
            pt: "Total da reserva:",
            fr: "Total de la réservation:"
        }

        const preload = (maxIntents) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (document.querySelector('html[cro-pag]')) {
                    hearPage();
                }
                else if (maxIntents == 75) {
                    console.warn(numScript, "Elem didn't load");
                }
                else {
                    maxIntents++;
                    preload(maxIntents);
                }
            }, 300);
        }

        const agregarStyle = () => {
            // Verificar si el estilo ya existe
            if (!document.querySelector('#custom-style')) {
                // Crear un elemento <style>
                let styleElement = document.createElement('style');

                // Definir el ID del estilo
                styleElement.id = 'custom-style';

                // Definir el contenido del estilo
                let styleContent = 'html[cro-pag="availability-ns-conf"] .journey-select_list_item--selected div.journey_price-currency { display: none !important; }';

                // Añadir el contenido al elemento <style>
                styleElement.innerHTML = styleContent;

                // Insertar el elemento <style> en el <head> del documento
                document.head.appendChild(styleElement);
            }
        }

        const hearPage = () => {
            const pageBefore = getPageID();
            const intervalSeats = setInterval(() => {
                //console.log('Revisando: ' , document.querySelector('.FB204.swat-button'));

                if (getPageID() == "availability-ns-conf" && document.querySelector('span.summary_trigger_price span.price_currency.ng-star-inserted')) {

                    const precioMenu = document.querySelector('span.summary_trigger_price span.price_currency.ng-star-inserted').textContent.split('  ,').join(',').split(' ,').join(',').split('  .').join('.').split(' .').join(',')

                    if (!precioMenu.includes(" 0.00") && !precioMenu.includes(" 0,00")) {

                        agregarStyle()

                        const container = document.createElement('div');
                        container.classList.add('FB219');
                        container.classList.add('swat-container');

                        const title = document.createElement('div');
                        title.classList.add('swat-title');
                        title.textContent = copys[getLang()];

                        const footer = document.createElement('div');
                        footer.classList.add('swat-footer');

                        const currency = document.createElement('div');
                        currency.classList.add('swat-currency')

                        const price = document.createElement('div');
                        price.classList.add('swat-price');
                        price.textContent = precioMenu;

                        footer.appendChild(currency)
                        footer.appendChild(price);

                        container.appendChild(title);
                        container.appendChild(footer);

                        if (!document.querySelector('.FB219')) {
                            document.querySelector('div.page_buttons_wrapper div.page_buttons').appendChild(container);
                        }
                        else if (document.querySelector('.FB219') && document.querySelector('.FB219 .swat-price').textContent != document.querySelector('span.summary_trigger_price span.price_currency.ng-star-inserted').textContent.split('  ,').join(',').split(' ,').join(',').split('  .').join('.').split(' .').join(',')) {
                            document.querySelector('.FB219 .swat-price').textContent = document.querySelector('span.summary_trigger_price span.price_currency.ng-star-inserted').textContent.split('  ,').join(',').split(' ,').join(',').split('  .').join('.').split(' .').join(',')
                        }
                    }
                }

                else if (getPageID() == "availability-ns-ib" && document.querySelector('span.summary_trigger_price span.price_currency.ng-star-inserted') && !document.querySelector('#custom-style')) {
                    agregarStyle()
                }
                else if (getPageID() == "availability-ns-ob" && document.querySelector('span.summary_trigger_price span.price_currency.ng-star-inserted') && !document.querySelector("span.searchresult_date_description_return.ng-star-inserted") && !document.querySelector('#custom-style')) {
                    agregarStyle()
                }
                else if (getPageID() != "availability-ns-conf") {
                    removeEverything();
                }
            }, 1000);
        }

        const removeEverything = () => {
            const elems = document.querySelectorAll('.FB219');
            for (const elem of elems) {
                elem.remove();
            }
        }

        const getLang = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("lang").split("-")[0].toLowerCase();
        }

        const getPageID = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pag");
        }

        const trackEvents = (identificador) => {
            const pushClickanalitycs = e => { let t = "AT_584633_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " ANALITYCS: ", t), window[analitycsElem].push({ event: "sendTargetEvent", target_action: t }) }, trackEvent = (e, t) => { let a = "AT_584633_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " MBOX: ", a), adobe.target.getOffer({ mbox: a, type: type, params: { ATFunctionName: "adobe.target.getOffer", campaignId: "584633", "audienceReport_584633": !1 }, success: () => { "function" == typeof t && t() }, error: (e, t) => { console.error("conv -> trackEvent Request failed", e, t) } }) };

            //try { trackEvent(identificador, "click"); } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to adobe: ", error); }
            //try { pushClickanalitycs(identificador) } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to analitycs: ", error); }
        }

        setTimeout(() => {
            if (sessionStorage.getItem('FB219') == null) {
                sessionStorage.setItem('FB219', 'true');
                trackEvents('visitantes');
            }

        }, 5000);

        setTimeout(() => {
            if (typeof FS !== 'undefined') {
                FS.event('AT_584633', {
                    campaignId: '584633',
                    campaignRecipeId: '0',
                    offerId: '2120447'
                })
            }
        }, 10000)

        let link = document.createElement('link');
        link.rel = 'stylesheet';
        link.href = 'https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Material+Symbols+Outlined:opsz,wght,FILL,GRAD@48,400,0,0';

        // Agrega el elemento link al head del documento
        document.head.appendChild(link);

        const validateEuropa = () => {
            return (sessionStorage.getItem('cro-pos') == 'eu' || sessionStorage.getItem('cro-pos') == 'uk')
        }

        if ((device == "des"))
            preload(0);
    })();
</script>

 .control_options_filters{

</style>

<script>

    (function () {

        let device = document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth >= 1025 ? 'des' : 'mob';

        const flujo = "NBF"; // DX
        const analitycsElem = (flujo == "NBF" ? "dataLayer" : "gtmDt");

        const numScript = "[FB361]";

        console.log(numScript);

        const srcNewIcons = {
            logo: 'data:image/svg+xml;base64,',
            logoFooter: 'data:image/svg+xml;base64,'
        }

        const arrayPos = ['co', 'ec', 'sv'];
        const validPos = () => {
            return arrayPos.includes(getPos());
        }


        const preload = (maxIntents) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                //   if (document.querySelector("body") && document.querySelector('html[cro-pos]') && validPos() == true) {
                if (document.querySelector("body") && document.querySelector('html[cro-pos]')) {
                    loadcss();
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        createRebranding();
                    }, 250);
                }
                // else if (document.querySelector('html[cro-pos]')) [
                //     console.log(numScript, 'Not valid POS')
                // ]
                else if (maxIntents == 75) {
                    console.warn(numScript, "Elem didn't load");
                }
                else {
                    maxIntents++;
                    preload(maxIntents);
                }
            }, 300);
        }

        const loadcss = () => {
            let styles = `
            img[src*="assets/imgs/logo-footer"],
                .ibe-footer_content {
                    background: none !important;
                }
            
            `

            let css = document.createElement("style");
            css.type = 'text/css';

            if (css.styleSheet) {
                css.styleSheet.cssText = styles
            }
            else {
                css.appendChild(document.createTextNode(styles))
            }

            document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(css);
        }

        const createRebranding = () => {
            setInterval(() => {
                let logoIcon = document.querySelector('img[src="https://static.avianca.com/media/1001/logo_av.svg"]');
                //let logoIconFlights = document.querySelectorAll('.journey-schedule_carriers_item img[src="//static.avianca.com/media/1002/avianca-logo.svg"]');
                let footerIcon = document.querySelector('img[src*="assets/imgs/logo-footer"]');
                let iconHidenFooter = document.querySelector(".ibe-footer_wrap .ibe-footer_content");

                if (logoIcon && !logoIcon.classList.contains("rebranded")) {
                    logoIcon.classList.add("rebranded");
                    logoIcon.setAttribute("src", srcNewIcons.logo);
                }

                if (footerIcon && !footerIcon.classList.contains("rebranded")) {
                    footerIcon.classList.add("rebranded");
                    footerIcon.setAttribute("src", srcNewIcons.logoFooter)
                }

                if (iconHidenFooter && !iconHidenFooter.classList.contains("rebranded")) {
                    iconHidenFooter.classList.add("rebranded");
                    iconHidenFooter.setAttribute("style", "background:none!important;")
                }
              
                if(document.querySelector('img[src="https://static.avianca.com/assets/imgs/logo.svg"]')){
                    document.querySelector('img[src="https://static.avianca.com/assets/imgs/logo.svg"]').setAttribute("src", srcNewIcons.logo);
                }
            }, 750);
        }

        const getLang = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("lang");
        }

        const getPageID = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pag");
        }

        const getPos = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pos");
        }


        if ((device == "des" || device == "mob")) {
            preload(0);
        }

    })();

</script>

<style>
    .FB716.legal-text {
        border-radius: 0px 0px 16px 16px;
        background: #FAFAFA;
        height: 43px;
        color: #5A5A5A;
        font-family: "Red Hat Display";
        font-size: 14px;
        font-style: normal;
        font-weight: 400;
        line-height: normal;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
    }

    @media screen and (max-width: 991px) {
        .FB716.legal-text {
            border-radius: 0px 0px 0px 0px;
        }
    }
</style>

<script>
    (function () {
        let device = document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth >= 1025 ? 'des' : 'mob';

        const flujo = "NBF"; // DX
        const analitycsElem = (flujo == "NBF" ? "dataLayer" : "gtmDt");

        const numScript = "[FB902]";

        console.log(numScript);

        const copys = {
            es: 'Vuelos sujetos a aprobación gubernamental.',
            en: 'Flights subject to government approval.',
            pt: 'Voos sujeitos à aprovação do governo.',
            fr: "Vols soumis à l'approbation gouvernementale."
        };

        const preload = (maxIntents) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (document.querySelector('div.connections_data')) {
                    verifyFlights();
                    setInterval(() => {
                        verifyFlights();
                    }, 1000);
                }
                else if (maxIntents == 75) {
                    console.warn(numScript, "Elem didn't load");
                }
                else {
                    maxIntents++;
                    preload(maxIntents);
                }
            }, 300);
        }


        const verifyFlights = () => {
            const allFlights = document.querySelectorAll('div.journey');

            // const arrayCodesToValidate = ["AV446", "AV447", "AV602", "AV603"];
            const arrayCodesToValidate = [];

            if (arrayCodesToValidate.length === 0) return;

            for (const flight of allFlights) {
                const codesAV = flight.querySelectorAll('div.connections_data .transport-code');

                for (const code of codesAV) {
                    if (arrayCodesToValidate.includes(code.textContent) == true) {
                        modifyFlight(flight);
                    }
                }

            }
        }

        const modifyFlight = (flight) => {
            const conecctions = flight.querySelector('div.connections_data');

            const newElem = document.createElement('div');
            newElem.classList.add('FB716');
            newElem.classList.add('legal-text');

            newElem.textContent = copys[getLang()];

            if (!conecctions.querySelector('.FB716'))
                conecctions.appendChild(newElem);

        }

        const getLang = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("lang").split("-")[0].toLowerCase();
        }

        const getPageID = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pag");
        }

        preload(0);
    })();
</script>

<!-- Version B -->
<style>
    @media (max-width: 992px) {

        .fare_header .subtitle,
        .fare_footer .fare_button .fare_button_price {
            display: none !important;
        }

        .fare-recommended {
            height: 92.5% !important;
        }

        .fare_button {
            padding: 12px !important;
            height: auto !important;
        }

        .fare-control .button_label {
            font-size: 20px;
        }


        .fare-control .fare_header .subtitle,
        .journey_fares_list_item .fare-control .fare_footer {
            padding-bottom: 0 !important;
        }

        .fare-control:not(.fare-flex):not(.fare-classic):not(.fare-light):not(.fare-basic) {
            .fare_footer {
                padding-bottom: 23px !important;

            }
        }

        .journey_fares_list_item .fare-control .fare_body {
            padding: 0 !important;
        }

        .journey_fares_list_item .fare-control .fare_header,
        .accordion-target.open .accordion-button {
            padding-bottom: 4.5px !important;
        }

        .journey_fares_list .journey_fares_list_item .fare-flex,
        .journey_fares_list .journey_fares_list_item .fare-classic,
        .journey_fares_list .journey_fares_list_item .fare-light,
        .journey_fares_list .journey_fares_list_item .fare-basic {
            min-height: 513px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            justify-content: space-between;

            .fare_list {
                display: grid;
                flex-direction: column;

            }
        }

        .accordion-target {
            margin-top: 10px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            background-color: #FAFAFA;
            overflow: hidden;
            transition: all 0.3s ease-out;
            grid-row: 4 / 4;
        }

        .accordion-button {
            cursor: pointer;
            padding: 12px;

</style>

<script>

    (function () {

        const device = document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth >= 992 ? "des" : "mob";

        const type = "1"; // | "0_control";
        const interaccion = "int";

        const flujo = "NS"; // DX || NS
        const analitycsElem = flujo == "NS" ? "dataLayer" : "gtmDt";

        const numScript = "[FB901]";
        console.log(numScript, 'Version B - mobile');

        const preload = (maxIntents) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (document.querySelector('.journey-selector.journey-selector-outbound')) {
                    setInterval(() => {
                        facelift();
                        waitForAccordion();
                    }, 750);
                } else if (maxIntents == 75) {
                    console.warn(numScript, "Elem didn't load");
                } else {
                    maxIntents++;
                    preload(maxIntents);
                }
            }, 300);
        };

        const copyAcordeon = {
            es: "Restricciones de la tarifa",
            en: "Fare Restrictions",
            pt: "Restrições da tarifa",
            fr: "Restrictions de tarif"
        };

        let lastTrackedValue = null;
        let flagBundle = true;

        let fareNameLittle;

        const facelift = () => {
            const fareControl = document.querySelectorAll(".fare-control");
            const flightSense = document.querySelectorAll('.journey-selector_header_label');
            const flightCountGeneral = flightSense.length;
            const flag = true;

            if (flightCountGeneral !== lastTrackedValue) {
                if (flightCountGeneral === 1) {
                    trackEvents("visualiza_ob");

                } else if (flightCountGeneral === 2) {
                    isHandlingClick = true;
                    trackEvents("visualiza_ib");
                    flagBundle = true;
                }
                lastTrackedValue = flightCountGeneral;
            }

            for (let i = 0; i < fareControl.length; i++) {
                let priceElement = fareControl[i].querySelector(".fare_button_price .price");
                let currencyElement = fareControl[i].querySelector(".fare_button_price .currency");

                let price = priceElement.textContent.split(' ').join('').trim();
                let currency = currencyElement.innerText.trim();

                let selectButton = fareControl[i].querySelector(".fare_button_label .button_label");
                if (selectButton) {
                    selectButton.innerText = currency + " " + price;
                }

                let pill = document.querySelector('[class*="card-baggage-text"]');

                if (pill) {
                    if (getLang() == 'es') {
                        let textContent = pill.textContent.trim();
                        if (textContent === "Añadir por") {
                            const changeText = document.querySelectorAll(".light-basic .fare_button_label .button_label");
                            for (let j = 0; j < changeText.length; j++) {
                                changeText[j].textContent = currency + " " + price;
                            }

                        } else {
                            const changeText = document.querySelectorAll(".light-basic .fare_button_label .button_label");
                            let numericPrice = parseInt(price.split('.').join(''), 10);
                            let finalPrice = numericPrice + 65000;
                            for (let k = 0; k < changeText.length; k++) {
                                changeText[k].textContent = currency + " " + finalPrice.toLocaleString("es-ES");;
                            }
                        }
                    } else {
                        let textContent = pill.textContent.trim();
                        if (textContent === "Add for") {
                            const changeText = document.querySelectorAll(".light-basic .fare_button_label .button_label");
                            for (let m = 0; m < changeText.length; m++) {
                                changeText[m].textContent = currency + " " + price;
                            }

                        } else {
                            const changeText = document.querySelectorAll(".light-basic .fare_button_label .button_label");
                            let numericPrice = parseInt(price.split(',').join(''), 10);
                            let finalPrice = numericPrice + 65000;
                            for (let r = 0; r < changeText.length; r++) {
                                changeText[r].textContent = currency + " " + finalPrice.toLocaleString("es-ES");;
                            }
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    selectButton.innerText = currency + " " + price;
                }

                if (fareControl[i].classList.contains("target-modification")) return;
                fareControl[i].classList.add("target-modification");

                fareControl[i].addEventListener("click", () => {
                    let fareNameClick = fareControl[i].querySelector('.fare_header .fare_name').innerText.trim();
                    const key = fareNameClick + "_" + (flightCountGeneral === 1 ? 'ob' : 'ib');
                    if (flagBundle) {
                        trackEvents("clic_bundle_" + key.replace(" ", ""));
                        flagBundle = false;
                    }
                });


                let fareNameElement = fareControl[i].querySelector(".fare_name");
                let fareName = fareNameElement.innerText.trim().toLowerCase();
                const fareClasses = {
                    light: "fare-light",
                    basic: "fare-basic",
                    flex: "fare-flex",
                    classic: "fare-classic"
                };

                if (fareClasses[fareName]) {
                    fareControl[i].classList.add(fareClasses[fareName]);
                }

                if (fareName === "basic" || fareName === "light") {
                    fareNameLittle = fareName;

                    fareControl[i].classList.add("light-basic");
                    let fareList = fareControl[i].querySelector(".fare_list");
                    let allItems = fareList.querySelectorAll(".fare_list_item");

                    let normalItems = [];
                    let disabledItems = [];

                    for (const item of allItems) {
                        if (item.classList.contains("disabled")) {
                            disabledItems.push(item);
                        } else {
                            normalItems.push(item);
                        }
                    }

                    if (disabledItems.length > 0) {
                        if (fareName === "basic") {
                            const lastDisabled = disabledItems[disabledItems.length - 1];
                            const clonedItem = lastDisabled.cloneNode(true);
                            clonedItem.classList.add("duplicate-disabled-preview");
                            clonedItem.classList.remove("disabled");

                            const description = clonedItem.querySelector(".fare_list_item_description");
                            if (description) {
                                description.textContent = "No incluye servicios adicionales";
                            }

                            fareList.appendChild(clonedItem);
                        }


                        let accordion = document.createElement("div");
                        accordion.classList.add("accordion-target");

                        let button = document.createElement("div");
                        button.innerText = copyAcordeon[getLang()];
                        button.classList.add("accordion-button");

                        let content = document.createElement("div");
                        content.classList.add("accordion-content");

                        for (let i = 0; i < disabledItems.length; i++) {
                            content.appendChild(disabledItems[i]);
                        }

                        accordion.appendChild(button);
                        accordion.appendChild(content);

                        if (normalItems.length > 0) {
                            normalItems[normalItems.length - 1].insertAdjacentElement("afterend", accordion);
                        } else {
                            fareList.appendChild(accordion);
                        }
                    }
                }
            };
        };

        const waitForAccordion = () => {
            const accordions = document.querySelectorAll(".accordion-target");
            for (const accordion of accordions) {
                // if (accordion && !accordion.classList.contains("event-inform")) {
                // Esto debemos dejarlo que añada eventos al elemento debido a que el modal de upselling cuando clona la card lo hace sin los eventos
                if (accordion) {
                    accordion.classList.add("event-inform")

                    const flightSense = document.querySelectorAll('.journey-selector_header_label');
                    accordion.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
                        e.stopImmediatePropagation();
                        e.stopPropagation();
                        e.preventDefault();

                        accordion.classList.toggle("open");
                        clickAcordeon = true;

                        const baggageContainer = document.querySelector('[class*="toogle-baggage-container"]');

                        if (baggageContainer) {
                            baggageContainer.style.display = accordion.classList.contains("open") ? "none" : "block";
                        }

                        const flightCount = flightSense.length;
                        const key = fareNameLittle + "_" + (flightCount === 1 ? "ob" : "ib");
                        const action = accordion.classList.contains("open") ? "abre" : "cierra";

                        trackEvents(action + "_desplegable_" + key);
                    });
                }
            }
        }

        const getPos = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pos");
        }

        const getLang = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("lang").split("-")[0].toLowerCase();
        }

        const getPageID = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pag");
        }

        const trackEvents = (identificador) => {
            const pushClickanalitycs = e => { let t = "AT_607073_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " ANALITYCS: ", t), window[analitycsElem].push({ event: "sendTargetEvent", target_action: t }) }, trackEvent = (e, t) => { let a = "AT_607073_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " MBOX: ", a), adobe.target.getOffer({ mbox: a, type: type, params: { ATFunctionName: "adobe.target.getOffer", campaignId: "607073", "audienceReport_607073": !1 }, success: () => { "function" == typeof t && t() }, error: (e, t) => { console.error("conv -> trackEvent Request failed", e, t) } }) };
            try { pushClickanalitycs(identificador) } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to analitycs: ", error); }
        }

        if (device == 'mob') preload(0);
    })()

</script>
