<script>
    (function () {

        let device = document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth >= 992 ? 'des' : 'mob';
        const type = "1"; // | "0_control";
        const visualizacion = "vis";
        const interaccion = "int";

        const flujo = "NS"; // DX
        const analitycsElem = (flujo == "NS" ? "dataLayer" : "gtmDt");
        const numScript = "[FB690]";

        console.log(numScript);

        const copys = {
            es: {
                pill: 'Cabina mixta',
                pillSelected: 'Cabina mixta',
                service: 'Asiento Flatbed (solo para REPLACE-ROUTE1-REPLACE-ROUTE2)'
            },
            en: {
                pill: 'Mixed cabin',
                pillSelected: 'Mixed cabin',
                service: 'Flatbed seat (only for REPLACE-ROUTE1-REPLACE-ROUTE2)'
            },
            pt: {
                pill: 'Cabine mista',
                pillSelected: 'Cabine mista',
                service: 'Assento Flatbed (para REPLACE-ROUTE1-REPLACE-ROUTE2)'
            },
            fr: {
                pill: 'Cabine mixte',
                pillSelected: 'Cabine mixte',
                service: 'Siège Flatbed (para REPLACE-ROUTE1-REPLACE-ROUTE2)'
            }
        }

        const validRoutes = ["BOG-MIA", "MDE-MIA", "MAD-SCL", "BOG-GRU", "BOG-EZE", "BOG-SCL", "EZE-MIA", "MAD-MEX", "CLO-MIA", "CTG-GRU", "BAQ-MIA", "EZE-MEX", "CTG-MIA", "GRU-LAX", "GRU-MIA", "EZE-UIO", "EZE-SJO", "CUN-EZE", "EZE-MAD", "EZE-PUJ", "CTG-SCL", "MEX-SCL", "BCN-SCL", "GRU-MAD", "CUN-SCL", "GRU-YYZ", "GRU-MCO", "PUJ-SCL", "GRU-SAL", "GIG-MIA", "MIA-SCL", "MIA-PEI", "CUR-GRU", "CUN-GRU", "CUC-SCL", "EZE-MDE", "EZE-SJU", "BCN-GRU", "GRU-MEX", "ADZ-GRU", "SCL-SJO", "GYE-MIA", "GRU-PUJ", "CUC-MIA", "SCL-YYZ", "GRU-UIO", "EZE-GYE", "GRU-MDE", "MDE-SCL", "EZE-IAD", "GRU-SJO", "CNF-MIA", "LAX-SCL", "BGA-MIA", "AUA-EZE", "AUA-SCL", "EZE-SDQ", "CTG-EZE", "CLO-EZE", "EZE-PTY", "CUR-EZE", "BAQ-EZE", "EZE-SAL", "BCN-EZE", "GRU-GYE", "AUA-GRU", "MCO-SCL", "LHR-SCL", "SCL-UIO", "GYE-SCL", "CLO-SCL", "ADZ-SCL", "MIA-UIO", "LIM-MIA", "LAX-SAL", "LAX-MGA", "LAX-SAP", "LAX-SJO", "LAX-XPL", "LAX-UIO", "BOG-LAX", "LAX-LIM", "GUA-LAX", "GYE-LAX", "CTG-LAX", "EZE-JFK", "GRU-JFK", "JFK-SCL"];
        // Rutas con BC operadas por Narrow bodies
        const validRoutesNB = ["SAL-MDE", "BOG-AEP", "BOG-JFK", "BOG-GRU", "BOG-MIA", "BOG-EZE", "BOG-IAD", "BOG-SCL", "BOG-MVD", "BOG-GIG", "BOG-YYZ", "BOG-MEX", "BOG-BOS", "BOG-ASU", "BOG-MCO", "BOG-YUL", "BOG-FLL", "BOG-COR", "BOG-ORD", "BOG-LIM", "BOG-PTY", "BOG-AEP", "SAL-BOG", "SAL-IAD", "SAL-JFK", "SAL-LAX", "SAL-LIM", "SAL-PTY", "SAL-SFO", "SAL-MEX", "SAL-MDE", "MDE-JFK", "MDE-LIM", "MDE-SCL", "MDE-EZE", "MDE-GRU"]
        const planesAllowed = ['787', 'A330']
        // Aviones Narrow body
        const planesNBAllowed = ['A319', 'A320', 'A320NEO']

        const preload = (maxIntents) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (document.querySelector(".journey-select_list_item")) {
                    useFulstory();
                    trackEvents("visitantes_cabina_mixta");
                    const intervalPage = setInterval(() => {
                        validateAllFlights();
                        cleanResults();
                        validateFlightsSelected();
                        createPillBoundleXXL();
                    }, 800);
                }
                else if (maxIntents == 55) {
                    console.warn(numScript, "Element does not loaded");
                }
                else {
                    maxIntents++;
                    preload(maxIntents);
                }
            }, 300);
        }

        const useFulstory = () => {
            if (typeof FS !== 'undefined') {
                FS.event('AT_580165', {
                    campaignId: '580165',
                    campaignRecipeId: '0',
                    offerId: '2079298'
                })
            }
        }

        const validateAllFlights = () => {
            const flights = document.querySelectorAll('.journey-select_list_item:not(.journey-select_list_item--selected)');
            for (const flight of flights) {
                const detailsFlight = flight.querySelector('.connections_data');

                if (!flight.classList.contains('FB598-mixed-cabin')) {
                    flight.classList.add('FB598-mixed-cabin');
                    validateRoute(detailsFlight);
                }
            }
        }

        const validatePlane = (detailsFlight) => {
            let result = false;
            const segments = detailsFlight?.querySelectorAll('ul.connections_journeys_group');
            if (!!segments) {
                for (const segment of segments) {
                    let plane = segment.querySelector('li.has-available-carrier span.transport-cabin').textContent;
                    plane = plane.split('BOEING ').join('').split('AIRBUS ').join('').split('-')[0].trim();
                    if (planesAllowed.includes(plane)) {
                        result = true;
                    }
                }
            }
            return result;
        }

        // WARNING : La funcion validatePlaneRoutes y validatePlane aunque sean muy similares, en realidad tienen usos muy especificos, unirlas podria dañar el correcto funcionamiento del codigo 
        const validatePlaneRoutes = (detailsFlight) => {
            let result = true;
            const segments = detailsFlight?.querySelectorAll('ul.connections_journeys_group');
            if (!!segments) {
                for (const segment of segments) {
                    let plane = segment.querySelector('li.has-available-carrier span.transport-cabin')?.textContent;
                    plane = plane?.split('BOEING ').join('').split('AIRBUS ').join('').split('-')[0].trim();
                    if (!planesAllowed.includes(plane)) {
                        result = false;
                    }
                }
            }
            return result
        }

        // Esta función valida y añade la pill de cabina mixta a los vuelos seleccionados por el usuario
        const validateFlightsSelected = () => {
            const flights = document.querySelectorAll('.journey-select_list_item.journey-select_list_item--selected');

            for (const flight of flights) {
                let bcSegments = [];
                let planesOperators = [];
                let airlineOperator = [];

                const detailsFlight = flight.querySelector('.connections_data');
                const segments = detailsFlight.querySelectorAll('ul.connections_journeys_group');
                const numberOfConections = segments.length;

                if (numberOfConections == 2 && validateBoundSelected(flight)) {
                    if (!flight.classList.contains('FB598-mixed-cabin-selected')) {
                        flight.classList.add('FB598-mixed-cabin-selected');

                        for (const segment of segments) {
                            let plane = segment.querySelector('li.has-available-carrier span.transport-cabin').textContent;
                            plane = plane.split('BOEING ').join('').split('AIRBUS ').join('').split('-')[0].trim();
                            const origin = segment.querySelectorAll('.connections_journeys_group_item span.station .station-code')[0].textContent.toUpperCase();
                            const destiny = segment.querySelectorAll('.connections_journeys_group_item span.station .station-code')[1].textContent.toUpperCase();
                            const routeTemp = origin + '-' + destiny;
                            const routeTemp2 = destiny + '-' + origin;
                            let operator = segment.querySelector(".transport-code").textContent
                            airlineOperator.push(operator);
                            planesOperators.push(plane);
                            bcSegments.push(routeTemp);
                            bcSegments.push(routeTemp2);
                        }

                        const numberOfSegments = detailsFlight.querySelectorAll('ul.connections_journeys_group').length
                        const validPlane = validatePlane(detailsFlight);
                        const validRoute = validateRouteSelected(detailsFlight, contadorSelected);
                        const boundSelected = validateBoundSelected(flight)
                        const validPlanesRoutes = validatePlaneRoutes(detailsFlight);

                        // Se valida bien sea que el trayeto sea operado un avion wide body y un narrow body, o dos narrow bodies
                        if ((validPlanesRoutes == false && numberOfSegments >= 2 && validPlane == true && validRoute == true && boundSelected == true) || ((planesNBAllowed.includes(planesOperators[0]) && planesNBAllowed.includes(planesOperators[1])) && (validRoutesNB.includes(bcSegments[0]) || validRoutesNB.includes(bcSegments[1]) || validRoutesNB.includes(bcSegments[2]) || validRoutesNB.includes(bcSegments[3])))) {
                            const textPill = createNewElem({ classData: 'fb-pill-text-mixed-fly-selected', textContentData: copys[getLang()]['pillSelected'] });
                            const iconPill = createNewElem({ classData: 'fb-pill-icon-mixed-fly-selected' });

                            const newPill = createNewElem({ classData: 'fb-pill-mixed-fly-selected fb-pill-mixed-fly-selected-xxl xxl-' + contadorSelected, appendElemsData: [textPill, iconPill] });
                            newPill.classList.add("selected")
                            flight.querySelector(".journey_price").appendChild(newPill)
                        }

                        // Estas siguientes piezas de codigo ocultan la pill de cabina mixta para vuelos donde:
                        // sea operado por una aerolinea diferente a avianca
                        if (!airlineOperator.every(elemento => elemento.includes('AV'))) {
                            flight.querySelector(".fb-pill-mixed-fly-selected.fb-pill-mixed-fly-selected-xxl.selected")?.setAttribute("style", "display:none");
                        }

                        // Valida que sean 2 narrow body y que ambos tengan cabina ejecutiva
                        if (planesNBAllowed.includes(planesOperators[0]) && planesNBAllowed.includes(planesOperators[1]) && ((validRoutesNB.includes(bcSegments[0]) || validRoutesNB.includes(bcSegments[1])) && (validRoutesNB.includes(bcSegments[2]) || validRoutesNB.includes(bcSegments[3])))) {
                            flight.querySelector(".fb-pill-mixed-fly-selected.fb-pill-mixed-fly-selected-xxl.selected")?.setAttribute("style", "display:none");
                        }
                        // Valida si es un vuelo operado por un wide body y un narrow body y si en ambos hay cabina ejecutiva
                        if (((planesAllowed.includes(planesOperators[0]) || planesAllowed.includes(planesOperators[1])) && (planesNBAllowed.includes(planesOperators[0]) || planesNBAllowed.includes(planesOperators[1])))) {
                            if ((planesNBAllowed.includes(planesOperators[0]) && (validRoutesNB.includes(bcSegments[0]) || validRoutesNB.includes(bcSegments[1]))) || (planesNBAllowed.includes(planesOperators[1]) && (validRoutesNB.includes(bcSegments[2]) || validRoutesNB.includes(bcSegments[3])))) {
                                flight.querySelector(".fb-pill-mixed-fly-selected.fb-pill-mixed-fly-selected-xxl.selected")?.setAttribute("style", "display:none");
                            }
                        }

                        contadorSelected++;
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        // Esta función valida y añade la pill de cabina mixta a los vuelos correspondientes
        const validateRoute = (detailsFlight) => {
            const validPlaneRoutes = validatePlaneRoutes(detailsFlight);

            if (validPlaneRoutes == false) {
                const segments = detailsFlight.querySelectorAll('ul.connections_journeys_group');
                const numberOfConections = segments.length;
                let bcSegments = [];
                let planesOperators = [];
                let airlineOperator = [];

                if (numberOfConections == 2) {
                    for (const segment of segments) {
                        let planeSelector = segment.querySelector('li.has-available-carrier span.transport-cabin');
                        if (planeSelector) {
                            let plane = planeSelector.textContent;
                            plane = plane.split('BOEING ').join('').split('AIRBUS ').join('').split('-')[0].trim();
                            const origin = segment.querySelectorAll('.connections_journeys_group_item span.station .station-code')[0].textContent.toUpperCase();
                            const destiny = segment.querySelectorAll('.connections_journeys_group_item span.station .station-code')[1].textContent.toUpperCase();
                            const routeTemp = origin + '-' + destiny;
                            const routeTemp2 = destiny + '-' + origin;
                            let airline = segment.querySelector(".transport-code").textContent
                            airlineOperator.push(airline)
                            planesOperators.push(plane);
                            bcSegments.push(routeTemp);
                            bcSegments.push(routeTemp2);

                            // Se valida que el avion que opera este vuelo sea un wide body para añadir la pill de cabina mixta
                            if (planesAllowed.includes(plane)) {
                                callMixedPill(segment, contador, origin, destiny);
                            }
                            // Se valida que el avion que opera este vuelo sean dos narrow body para añadir la pill de cabina mixta
                            if ((validRoutesNB.includes(routeTemp) || validRoutesNB.includes(routeTemp2)) && planesNBAllowed.includes(plane)) {
                                callMixedPill(segment, contador, origin, destiny);
                            }
                            contador++;
                        }
                    }

                    // Estas siguientes piezas de codigo ocultan la pill de cabina mixta para vuelos donde:
                    // sea operado por una aerolinea diferente a avianca
                    if (!airlineOperator.every(elemento => elemento.includes('AV'))) {
                        let parentElem = getParentElem(segments[0]).classList.add("FB598-mixed-cabin-excluded");
                    }

                    // Valida que sean 2 narrow body y que ambos tengan cabina ejecutiva
                    if (planesNBAllowed.includes(planesOperators[0]) && planesNBAllowed.includes(planesOperators[1]) && ((validRoutesNB.includes(bcSegments[0]) || validRoutesNB.includes(bcSegments[1])) && (validRoutesNB.includes(bcSegments[2]) || validRoutesNB.includes(bcSegments[3])))) {
                        let parentElem = getParentElem(segments[0]).classList.add("FB598-mixed-cabin-excluded");
                    }
                    // Valida si es un vuelo operado por un wide body y un narrow body y si en ambos hay cabina ejecutiva
                    if (((planesAllowed.includes(planesOperators[0]) || planesAllowed.includes(planesOperators[1])) && (planesNBAllowed.includes(planesOperators[0]) || planesNBAllowed.includes(planesOperators[1])))) {
                        if ((planesNBAllowed.includes(planesOperators[0]) && (validRoutesNB.includes(bcSegments[0]) || validRoutesNB.includes(bcSegments[1]))) || (planesNBAllowed.includes(planesOperators[1]) && (validRoutesNB.includes(bcSegments[2]) || validRoutesNB.includes(bcSegments[3])))) {
                            let parentElem = getParentElem(segments[0]).classList.add("FB598-mixed-cabin-excluded");
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        // Llama la ejecución de la pill de cabina mixta
        const callMixedPill = (segment, contador, origin, destiny) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                let originSegment = segment.querySelectorAll('.connections_journeys_group_item span.station')[0].textContent.replace(origin, '').trim();
                let destinySegment = segment.querySelectorAll('.connections_journeys_group_item span.station')[1].textContent.replace(destiny, '').trim();

                let parentElem = getParentElem(segment);
                if (!parentElem.classList.contains("FB598-mixed-cabin-excluded")) {
                    parentElem.classList.add('FB598-mixed-cabin-parent-' + contador)
                    parentElem.classList.add('FB598-mixed-cabin-parent');
                    parentElem.classList.add('with-pill');
                    parentElem.classList.add('with-pill-' + origin + "-" + destiny);
                    createStylesXXL(originSegment, destinySegment, 'FB598-mixed-cabin-parent-' + contador);
                }
            }, 400);
        }

        const createStylesXXL = (originAiport, destinyAirport, classCounted) => {
            let styles = `
                html[lang='es'] .REPLACE-CLASS .fb-pill-mixed-fly-xxl:hover::after,
                html[lang='es'] .REPLACE-CLASS .fb-pill-mixed-fly-xxl:focus::after {
                    content: "La experiencia en business class (asiento y menú) solo está disponible para el trayecto REPLACE-ORIGIN - REPLACE-DESTINY.";
                    left: -163px;
                }

                html[lang='en'] .REPLACE-CLASS .fb-pill-mixed-fly-xxl:hover::after,
                html[lang='en'] .REPLACE-CLASS .fb-pill-mixed-fly-xxl:focus::after {
                    content: "business class experience (seat and menu) is only available for the REPLACE-ORIGIN - REPLACE-DESTINY.";
                    left: -163px;
                }

                html[lang='pt'] .REPLACE-CLASS .fb-pill-mixed-fly-xxl:hover::after,
                html[lang='pt'] .REPLACE-CLASS .fb-pill-mixed-fly-xxl:focus::after {
                    content: "A experiência da business class (Assento e menu) está disponível apenas para o voo REPLACE-ORIGIN - REPLACE-DESTINY.";
                    left: -163px;
                }
                
                html[lang='fr'] .REPLACE-CLASS .fb-pill-mixed-fly-xxl:hover::after,
                html[lang='fr'] .REPLACE-CLASS .fb-pill-mixed-fly-xxl:focus::after {
                    content: "L'expérience en business class (siège et menu) est uniquement disponible pour le trajet REPLACE-ORIGIN - REPLACE-DESTINY.";
                    left: -163px;
                }
            `

            styles = styles.split('REPLACE-ORIGIN').join(originAiport).split('REPLACE-DESTINY').join(destinyAirport).replaceAll('REPLACE-CLASS', classCounted);

            let css = document.createElement("style");
            css.type = 'text/css';

            if (css.styleSheet) {
                css.styleSheet.cssText = styles
            }
            else {
                css.appendChild(document.createTextNode(styles))
            }

            document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(css);
        }

        const createPillBoundleXXL = () => {
            if (document.querySelector(".with-pill .fare6")) {
                let clases;
                if (device == "des") {
                    clases = document.querySelector(".with-pill .fare6").parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.getAttribute("class");
                } else {
                    clases = document.querySelector(".with-pill .fare6").parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.getAttribute("class");
                }
                const patron = /with-pill-(.*)/;
                const coincidencias = clases.match(patron);
                const parteExtraida = coincidencias[1];
                const [originFlight, destinyFlight] = parteExtraida.split('-');

                let text = copys[getLang()].service;
                let texto = text.replace("REPLACE-ROUTE1", originFlight).replace("REPLACE-ROUTE2", destinyFlight);

                const textPill = createNewElem({ classData: 'fb-pill-text-mixed-fly-xxl', textContentData: copys[getLang()]['pill'] });
                const iconPill = createNewElem({ classData: 'fb-pill-icon-mixed-fly-xxl' });
                const newPill = createNewElem({ classData: 'fb-pill-mixed-fly-xxl', appendElemsData: [textPill, iconPill] });

                newPill.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
                    e.preventDefault();
                });

                let place = document.querySelector(".with-pill .fare6")?.parentElement.parentElement;
                let pill = document.querySelector(".fb-pill-mixed-fly-xxl");
                if (place && !pill) {
                    place.setAttribute("style", "position:relative")
                    place.appendChild(newPill);

                }

                let services = document.querySelectorAll(".with-pill .fare6 .fare_list .fare_list_item .fare_list_item_description");

                for (const service of services) {
                    if (service.textContent.includes("Flatbed") && service.textContent != texto) {
                        service.textContent = texto;
                        service.parentElement.setAttribute("style", "width: max-content;")
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        const cleanResults = () => {
            const elems = document.querySelectorAll('.journey-selector.journey-selector-outbound.journey-selector-selected, .journey-select_list_item.journey-select_list_item--selected.FB598-mixed-cabin-selected');
            for (const elem of elems) {
                if (elem.querySelector('.fb-pill-mixed-fly')) {
                    elem.querySelector('.fb-pill-mixed-fly').remove();
                }
                if (elem.classList.contains('FB219')) {
                    elem.classList.remove('FB219');
                }

                if (elem.classList.contains('FB219-selected')) {
                    elem.classList.remove('FB219-selected');
                }

                if (document.querySelectorAll('.FB598-mixed-cabin-selected').length >= 2) {
                    const pills = document.querySelectorAll('.fb-pill-mixed-fly');
                    for (const pill of pills) { pill.remove(); }
                }
            }
        }

        let contadorSelected = 0;
        let contador = 0;

        const validateRouteSelected = (detailsFlight, contadorSelected) => {
            let result = false;

            const segments = detailsFlight.querySelectorAll('ul.connections_journeys_group');
            for (const segment of segments) {
                let plane = segment.querySelector('li.has-available-carrier span.transport-cabin').textContent;
                plane = plane.split('BOEING ').join('').split('AIRBUS ').join('').split('-')[0].trim();
                const origin = segment.querySelectorAll('.connections_journeys_group_item span.station .station-code')[0].textContent.toUpperCase();
                const destiny = segment.querySelectorAll('.connections_journeys_group_item span.station .station-code')[1].textContent.toUpperCase();
                const routeTemp = origin + '-' + destiny
                const routeTemp2 = destiny + '-' + origin

                if (planesAllowed.includes(plane) || (planesNBAllowed.includes(plane) && (validRoutesNB.includes(routeTemp) || validRoutesNB.includes(routeTemp2)))) {
                    let originSegment = segment.querySelectorAll('.connections_journeys_group_item span.station')[0].textContent.replace(origin, '').trim();
                    let destinySegment = segment.querySelectorAll('.connections_journeys_group_item span.station')[1].textContent.replace(destiny, '').trim();
                    let parentElem = getParentElem(segment);
                    parentElem.classList.add('FB598-mixed-cabin-parent-' + contador)

                    createPillToBundleXXLSelected(originSegment, destinySegment, contadorSelected);
                    contador++;
                    result = true;
                }
            }

            return result;
        }

        const createPillToBundleXXLSelected = (originAiport, destinyAirport, contadorSelected) => {
            let styles = `
                html[lang='es'] .fb-pill-mixed-fly-selected-xxl.xxl-REPLACE-NUMBER:hover::after,
                html[lang='es'] .fb-pill-mixed-fly-selected-xxl.xxl-REPLACE-NUMBER:focus::after{
                    content: "La experiencia en business class (asiento y menú) solo está disponible para el trayecto REPLACE-ORIGIN - REPLACE-DESTINY.";
                }

                html[lang='es'] .fb-pill-mixed-fly-selected-no-xxl:hover::after{
                    content: "Es posible que los asientos o el servicio de comida a bordo varíen en los diferentes trayectos de esta ruta.";
                }

                html[lang='en'] .fb-pill-mixed-fly-selected-xxl.xxl-REPLACE-NUMBER:hover::after,
                html[lang='en'] .fb-pill-mixed-fly-selected-xxl.xxl-REPLACE-NUMBER:focus::after{
                    content: "business class experience (seat and menu) is only available for the REPLACE-ORIGIN - REPLACE-DESTINY.";
                }

                html[lang='en'] .fb-pill-mixed-fly-selected-no-xxl:hover::after{
                    content: "It is possible that the seats or onboard meal service may vary on different ways of this route.";
                }

                html[lang='pt'] .fb-pill-mixed-fly-selected-xxl.xxl-REPLACE-NUMBER:hover::after,
                html[lang='pt'] .fb-pill-mixed-fly-selected-xxl.xxl-REPLACE-NUMBER:focus::after{
                    content: "A experiência da business class (Assento e menu) está disponível apenas para o voo REPLACE-ORIGIN - REPLACE-DESTINY.";
                }
                
                html[lang='fr'] .fb-pill-mixed-fly-selected-xxl.xxl-REPLACE-NUMBER:hover::after,
                html[lang='fr'] .fb-pill-mixed-fly-selected-xxl.xxl-REPLACE-NUMBER:focus::after{
                    content: "L'expérience en business class (siège et menu) est uniquement disponible pour le trajet REPLACE-ORIGIN - REPLACE-DESTINY.";
                }
            `
            styles = styles.split('REPLACE-ORIGIN').join(originAiport).split('REPLACE-DESTINY').join(destinyAirport).split('REPLACE-NUMBER').join(contadorSelected)

            let css = document.createElement("style");
            css.type = 'text/css';

            if (css.styleSheet) {
                css.styleSheet.cssText = styles
            }
            else {
                css.appendChild(document.createTextNode(styles))
            }

            document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(css);
        }

        const validateBoundSelected = (detailsFlight) => {
            let result = false;

            if (detailsFlight.querySelector('.journey_price_fare_name-text')) {
                const boundSelected = detailsFlight.querySelector('.journey_price_fare_name-text').textContent.toLowerCase();

                if (boundSelected.indexOf('business') > -1) {
                    result = true;
                }
                else {
                    result = false;
                }
            }

            return result;
        }

        const getParentElem = (elem) => {
            return elem.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement
        }

        const getLang = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("lang").split("-")[0].toLowerCase();
        }

        const getPageID = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pag");
        }

        const getCountry = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pos").split("-")[0].toLowerCase();;
        }

        const createNewElem = (data) => {
            const newElem = document.createElement('div');

            if (data['idData']) newElem.setAttribute('id', data['idData']);
            if (data['classData']) newElem.setAttribute('class', data['classData']);
            if (data['textContentData']) newElem.textContent = data['textContentData'];
            if (data['innerHtmlData']) newElem.innerHTML = data['innerHtmlData'];
            if (data['appendElemsData']) for (const elem of data['appendElemsData']) { newElem.appendChild(elem) }

            return newElem;
        }

        const trackEvents = (identificador) => {
            const pushClickanalitycs = e => { let t = "AT_502974_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " ANALITYCS: ", t), window[analitycsElem].push({ event: "sendTargetEvent", target_action: t }) }, trackEvent = (e, t) => { let a = "AT_502974_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " MBOX: ", a), adobe.target.getOffer({ mbox: a, type: type, params: { ATFunctionName: "adobe.target.getOffer", campaignId: "502974", "audienceReport_502974": !1 }, success: () => { "function" == typeof t && t() }, error: (e, t) => { console.error("conv -> trackEvent Request failed", e, t) } }) };
            //try { trackEvent(identificador, "click"); } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to adobe: ", error); }
            //try { pushClickanalitycs(identificador) } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to analitycs: ", error); }
        }

        const messages = (message) => {
            console.log(numScript, message);
        }

        preload(0)

    })();
</script>

<style>
    .boxes-FB205 p {
        display: flex;

    .boxes-FB205 {
        display: flex;

        gap: 8px;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .box-FB205 {
        padding: 16px;
        line-height: 79px;
        border-radius: 8px;
        border: 1px solid #EF5B06;
        background-color: #FDFBF7;
        margin: 32px 0px;
        margin-bottom: -28px;
    }

    .container-principal-FB205 {
       
        max-width: 1248px;
        width: 100%;
        margin: 0 auto;
    }

    .icono-alerta {
        background-image: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,);
        width: 16px;

    }

    /* html[cro-pag="availability-ns-ib"] .box-FB205 {
        margin-bottom: 68px;

    }

    }

<script>

    (function () {
        let device =
            document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth >= 1025 ? "des" : "mob";

        const type = "0"; // | "0_control";
        const visualizacion = "vis";
        const interaccion = "int";

        // const pages = {
        //     availabilityNbfOB: "availability-nbfob",
        //     availabilityNbfIB: "availability-nbfib",
        //     availabilityNbfCONF: "availability-nbfconf",
        //     passengerNbfPAX: "passenger-nbfpax",
        //     ancillariesNbfASS: "ancillary-nbfaas",
        //     farereviewNbfFare: "farereview-nbffare",
        //     pagosNbfPAY: "pagos-nbfpay",
        //     confirmationNbfConf: "confirmation-nbfconf"
        // }

        const copys_travel_angeles = {
            es: {
                titleCintilla: "En la ciudad de Los Ángeles contamos con dos aeropuertos:",
                descripcionCintilla: "Los Ángeles (LAX) y Ontario (ONT). Verifica esta información durante tu búsqueda.",
            },
            en: {
                titleCintilla: "In the city of Los Angeles we have two airports:",
                descripcionCintilla: "Los Angeles (LAX) and Ontario (ONT). Check this information during your search.",
            },
            pt: {
                titleCintilla: "Na cidade de Los Angeles, temos dois aeroportos:",
                descripcionCintilla: "Los Angeles (LAX) e Ontario (ONT). Verifique essas informações durante a sua pesquisa.",
            }
        };

        const flujo = "NS"; // DX
        const analitycsElem = flujo == "NS" ? "dataLayer" : "gtmDt";

        const numScript = "[FB763]";
        console.log(numScript)

        // if (type == 0) console.log(numScript, "Control");
        // if (type == 1) console.log(numScript, "Version B");
        // if (type == 2) console.log(numScript, "Version C");

        const preload = (maxIntents) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (
                    document.querySelector('html[cro-pag="availability-ns-conf"]') ||
                    document.querySelector('html[cro-pag="availability-ns-ib"]')
                ) {
                    sessionStorage.setItem("ocultar-los-angeles", false);
                    setInterval(() => {
                        if (
                            !document.querySelector(".box-FB205") &&
                            sessionStorage.getItem("ocultar-los-angeles") == "false" &&
                            (document
                                .querySelector(".departure_station_code")
                                .textContent.trim() == "LAX" ||
                                document
                                    .querySelector(".departure_station_code")
                                    .textContent.trim() == "ONT" ||
                                document
                                    .querySelector(".return_station_code")
                                    .textContent.trim() == "LAX" ||
                                document
                                    .querySelector(".return_station_code")
                                    .textContent.trim() == "ONT")
                        ) {
                            create_modal();

                            // Hide modal on comfirm page
                            const interval = setInterval(() => {
                                let fligthType = document.querySelectorAll(
                                    ".searchresult_date_description span"
                                );
                                let selectedFlights = document.querySelectorAll(
                                    ".journey-selector-selected"
                                );

                                // Round Trip
                                if (
                                    fligthType.length > 1 &&
                                    selectedFlights.length > 1 &&
                                    getPageID() === "availability-ns-conf" &&
                                    document.querySelector(".box-FB205")
                                ) {
                                    document.querySelector(".box-FB205").style.display = "none";
                                    clearInterval(interval);
                                }

                                // One Way
                                if (
                                    fligthType.length === 1 &&
                                    selectedFlights.length === 1 &&
                                    getPageID() === "availability-ns-conf" &&
                                    document.querySelector(".box-FB205")
                                ) {
                                    document.querySelector(".box-FB205").style.display = "none";
                                    clearInterval(interval);
                                }
                            }, 4000);
                        }
                    }, 500);
                } else if (maxIntents == 100000) {
                    console.warn(numScript, "Elem didn't load");
                } else {
                    maxIntents++;
                    preload(maxIntents);
                }
            }, 300);
        };

      
        const create_modal = () => {
            
            const divContainerPrincipal = document.createElement("div");
            divContainerPrincipal.classList.add("container-principal-FB205");

            
            const div = document.createElement("div");
            div.classList.add("boxes-FB205");

            const img = document.createElement("div");
            img.classList.add("icono-alerta");

            const p = document.createElement("p");
            p.innerHTML = copys_travel_angeles[getLang()].titleCintilla;

            const X = document.createElement("div");
            X.classList.add("close-FB205");
            X.addEventListener("click", () => {
                sessionStorage.setItem("ocultar-galapago", true);
                document.querySelector(".box-FB205").classList.add("ocultar");
            });

    
            div.appendChild(img);
            div.appendChild(p);
            div.appendChild(X);

          
            const parrafoDescrip = document.createElement("p");
            parrafoDescrip.classList.add("p-descripc");
            parrafoDescrip.innerHTML = copys_travel_angeles[getLang()].descripcionCintilla;

            const div_father = document.createElement("div");
            div_father.classList.add("box-FB205");

            div_father.appendChild(div);
            div_father.appendChild(parrafoDescrip);

            divContainerPrincipal.appendChild(div_father);

            const header = document.querySelector("div#combinedSummaryDiv");
            header?.parentNode.insertBefore(divContainerPrincipal, header.nextSibling);
        };


        const getLang = () => {
            return document
                .querySelector("html")
                .getAttribute("lang")
                .split("-")[0]
                .toLowerCase();
        };

        const getPageID = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pag");
        };

        const trackEvent = (e, t) => {
            let a =
                "AT_588632_" +
                device +
                "_" +
                interaccion +
                "_" +
                type +
                "_" +
                e;
            console.log(numScript, " MBOX: ", a),
                adobe.target.getOffer({
                    mbox: a,
                    type: type,
                    params: {
                        ATFunctionName: "adobe.target.getOffer",
                        campaignId: "588632",
                        "audienceReport_588632": !1,
                    },
                    success: () => {
                        "function" == typeof t && t();
                    },
                    error: (e, t) => {
                        console.error("conv -> trackEvent Request failed", e, t);
                    },
                });
        };

        const allPushs = () => {
            const trackFS = () => {
                if ("undefined" != typeof FS) {
                    // try {
                    //   trackEvent("FS-is-defined", "click");
                    // } catch (i) {
                    //   console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to adobe: ", i);
                    // }
                    FS.event("AT_588632", {
                        campaignId: "588632",
                        campaignRecipeId: "0",
                        offerId: "2154195",
                    });
                } else {
                }
            },
                pushVisualisationToAnalitics = () => {
                    try {
                        console.log(
                            numScript,
                            "Pushed to analitycs:: AT_588632_" +
                            device +
                            "_" +
                            visualizacion +
                            "_" +
                            type
                        ),
                            window[analitycsElem].push({
                                event: "targetEvent",
                                target_action:
                                    "AT_588632_" +
                                    device +
                                    "_" +
                                    visualizacion +
                                    "_" +
                                    type,
                                target_test1:
                                    "AT_588632_" +
                                    device +
                                    "_" +
                                    visualizacion +
                                    "_" +
                                    type,
                                target_test2:
                                    "AT_588632_" +
                                    device +
                                    "_" +
                                    visualizacion +
                                    "_" +
                                    type,
                                target_test3:
                                    "AT_588632_" +
                                    device +
                                    "_" +
                                    visualizacion +
                                    "_" +
                                    type,
                            });
                    } catch (i) {
                        console.error(numScript, "pushVisualisationToAnalitics", i);
                    }
                },
                trackVisitantes = () => {
                    // try {
                    //   trackEventVisitors("visitantes", "click");
                    // } catch (i) {
                    //   console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to adobe: ", i);
                    // }
                    try {
                        pushVisualisationToAnaliticsVisitors("visitantes");
                    } catch (i) {
                        console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to analitycs: ", i);
                    }
                },
                pushVisualisationToAnaliticsVisitors = (i) => {
                    try {
                        console.log(
                            numScript,
                            " Pushed Visitantes:: AT_588632_" + i + "_" + type
                        ),
                            window[analitycsElem].push({
                                event: "sendTargetEvent",
                                target_action: "AT_588632_" + i + "_" + type,
                            });
                    } catch (i) {
                        console.error(
                            numScript,
                            " pushVisualisationToAnaliticsVisitors",
                            i
                        );
                    }
                },
                trackEventVisitors = (i, t) => {
                    let e = "AT_588632_" + i + "_" + type;
                    console.log(numScript, " MBOX-1: ", e),
                        adobe.target.getOffer({
                            mbox: e,
                            type: type,
                            params: {
                                ATFunctionName: "adobe.target.getOffer",
                                campaignId: "588632",
                                "audienceReport_588632": !1,
                            },
                            success: () => {
                                "function" == typeof t && t();
                            },
                            error: (i, t) => {
                                console.error("conv -> trackEvent Request failed", i, t);
                            },
                        });
                    let a = "AT_588632_" + i;
                    console.log(numScript, " MBOX-2: ", a),
                        adobe.target.getOffer({
                            mbox: a,
                            type: type,
                            params: {
                                ATFunctionName: "adobe.target.getOffer",
                                campaignId: "588632",
                                "audienceReport_588632": !1,
                            },
                            success: () => {
                                "function" == typeof t && t();
                            },
                            error: (i, t) => {
                                console.error("conv -> trackEvent Request failed", i, t);
                            },
                        });
                };
            if (sessionStorage.getItem(numScript) == null) {
                sessionStorage.setItem(numScript, "true");
                if (type != 0) {
                    trackFS();
                }
                pushVisualisationToAnalitics();
                trackVisitantes();
            }
        };

        const trackEvents = (identificador) => {
            const pushClickanalitycs = (e) => {
                let t =
                    "AT_588632_" +
                    device +
                    "_" +
                    interaccion +
                    "_" +
                    type +
                    "_" +
                    e;
                console.log(numScript, " ANALITYCS: ", t),
                    window[analitycsElem].push({
                        event: "sendTargetEvent",
                        target_action: t,
                    });
            },
                trackEvent = (e, t) => {
                    let a =
                        "AT_588632_" +
                        device +
                        "_" +
                        interaccion +
                        "_" +
                        type +
                        "_" +
                        e;
                    console.log(numScript, " MBOX: ", a),
                        adobe.target.getOffer({
                            mbox: a,
                            type: type,
                            params: {
                                ATFunctionName: "adobe.target.getOffer",
                                campaignId: "588632",
                                "audienceReport_588632": !1,
                            },
                            success: () => {
                                "function" == typeof t && t();
                            },
                            error: (e, t) => {
                                console.error("conv -> trackEvent Request failed", e, t);
                            },
                        });
                };

            // try {
            //   trackEvent(identificador, "click");
            // } catch (error) {
            //   console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to adobe: ", error);
            // }
            try {
                pushClickanalitycs(identificador);
            } catch (error) {
                console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to analitycs: ", error);
            }
        };

        const validateEuropa = () => {
            return (
                sessionStorage.getItem("cro-pos") == "eu" ||
                sessionStorage.getItem("cro-pos") == "uk"
            );
        };
        if (device == "des" || device == "mob") preload(0);
    })();


</script>

<script>
    (function () {
        let device = document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth >= 993 ? "des" : "mob";
        const type = "1"; // | "0_control";
        const visualizacion = "vis";
        const interaccion = "int";

        const flujo = "NS"; // DX
        const analitycsElem = flujo == "NS" ? "dataLayer" : "gtmDt";

        const numScript = "[FB851]";
        console.log(numScript);

        const copys = {
            es: {
                mensaje: ' Todos los impuestos están incluidos en el precio total.',
                titulo: '¡Sin sorpresas!'
            },
            en: {
                mensaje: 'All taxes are included in the total price.',
                titulo: 'No surprises!'
            },
            pt: {
                mensaje: 'Todos os impostos estão incluídos no preço total.',
                titulo: 'Sem surpresas!'
            },
        };

        const preload = (maxIntents) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (document.querySelector(".ui-accordion_item.ng-tns-c6-1.ng-star-inserted") && getLang() !== "fr") {
                    generadorSinSorpresa();
                    let intervalSinSorpresa = setInterval(generadorSinSorpresa, 600)
                } else if (maxIntents == 75) {
                    console.warn(numScript, "Elem didn't load");
                } else {
                    maxIntents++;
                    preload(maxIntents);
                }
            }, 300);
        };

        const generadorSinSorpresa = () => {
            if (!document.querySelector(".mensaje-sin-sorpresas")) {
                crearMensaje();
            }
        }

        const crearMensaje = () => {
            let contenedorBotones;
            if (device == "des") {
                contenedorBotones = document.querySelector(".page_buttons")
            } else {
                contenedorBotones = document.querySelector(".ui-accordion")
            }

            let nuevoMensaje = document.createElement("div");
            nuevoMensaje.classList.add("mensaje-sin-sorpresas")

            let containerMensaje = document.createElement("div");
            containerMensaje.classList.add("container-mensaje")

            let containerTextoTitulo = document.createElement("div");
            containerTextoTitulo.classList.add("container-titulo-texto");

            let containerTitulo = document.createElement("div");
            containerTitulo.classList.add("container-titulo")
            let titulo = document.createElement("h2", "titulo")
            titulo.textContent = copys[getLang()].titulo;
            containerTitulo.appendChild(titulo)

            let containerTexto = document.createElement("div");
            containerTexto.classList.add("container-texto")
            let texto = document.createElement("p", "texto")
            texto.textContent = copys[getLang()].mensaje
            containerTexto.appendChild(texto)

            let containerIcon = document.createElement("div");
            containerIcon.classList.add("container-icon")
            let icon = document.createElement("div", "icon")
            containerIcon.appendChild(icon);

            contenedorBotones.appendChild(nuevoMensaje);
            nuevoMensaje.appendChild(containerMensaje);
            containerMensaje.appendChild(containerIcon);
            containerMensaje.appendChild(containerTextoTitulo);
            containerTextoTitulo.appendChild(containerTitulo);
            containerTextoTitulo.appendChild(containerTexto);
        }

        const createElem = (elemType, newClass) => {
            const newElem = document.createElement(elemType);
            newElem.setAttribute("class", newClass);
            return newElem;
        };

        const getLang = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("lang");
        };

        const getPageID = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pag");
        };

        const getPos = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pos").toLowerCase();
        };

        const trackEvents = (identificador) => {
            const pushClickanalitycs = e => { let t = "AT_602691_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " ANALITYCS: ", t), window[analitycsElem].push({ event: "sendTargetEvent", target_action: t }) }, trackEvent = (e, t) => { let a = "AT_602691_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " MBOX: ", a), adobe.target.getOffer({ mbox: a, type: type, params: { ATFunctionName: "adobe.target.getOffer", campaignId: "602691", "audienceReport_602691": !1 }, success() { "function" == typeof t && t() }, error(e, t) { console.error("conv -> trackEvent Request failed", e, t) } }) };
            try { pushClickanalitycs(identificador); } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to analitycs: ", error); }
        };

        if (device == "des" || device == "mob")
            preload(0);
    })();
</script>

<style>
    .FB715,
    .FB715 * {
        transition: all 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.68, -0.55, 0.27, 1.55);
        /* Curva para el efecto de rebote */
    }

    .FB715.container-message-promocode {
        position: fixed;
        left: 6vw;
        bottom: 36px;
        /* width: 100px; */
        /* height: 100px; */
        display: flex;
        min-width: 200px;
        max-width: 1248px;
        padding: var(--padding-16px, 16px);
        align-items: flex-start;
        gap: var(--gap-12px, 12px);
        border-radius: var(--bradius-8px-m, 8px);
        border: 1px solid var(--alert-alert-positive, #1EA93C);
        background: var(--alert-alert-success-lighter, #F8FCF8);
        box-shadow: 0px 0px 32px 0px rgba(27, 27, 27, 0.15);
        justify-content: space-between;
        z-index: 10000;
    }

    .FB715.container-message-promocode.hidden {
        bottom: -150px !important
    }

    .FB715 .container-content {
        width: 320px;
    }

    /*https://www.avianca.com/es/booking/select/?departure1=2025-02-15&departure2=2025-02-16&platform=WEBB2C&origin1=BOG&destination1=MDE&adt1=1&tng1=0&chd1=00&inf1=01&accountcode=WEBFV&posCode=CO&utm_campaign=ruta_uci&origin2=MDE&destination2=BOG&adt2=1&tng2=0&chd2=00&inf2=01&currency=COP&Device=web&testing=true*/
    .FB715 .icon-message {
        width: 20px;
        height: 20px;
        background-image: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,);
        background-size: contain;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;

    }

    .FB715 .container-content .title-content {
        color: var(--alert-alert-text, #1B1B1B);
        font-feature-settings: 'liga' off, 'clig' off;

        /* Brand/Subtitle/subtitle5 */
        font-family: "Red Hat Display";
        font-size: 16px;
        font-style: normal;
        font-weight: 700;
        line-height: normal;
    }

    .FB715 .container-content .content-content {
        color: var(--alert-alert-text, #1B1B1B);

        /* Brand/Body/body3 */

        background-image: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,);
        background-size: contain;
        cursor: pointer;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
    }

    html[cro-pag="availability-ns-conf"] .FB715.container-message-promocode {
        width: 362px;
        /* height: 74px; */
        height: auto;
        box-sizing: border-box;
    }

    html[cro-pag="availability-ns-conf"] .FB715 .icon-message,
    html[cro-pag="availability-ns-conf"] .FB715 .icon-close {
        margin-top: 3px;
    }

    html[cro-pag="availability-ns-conf"] .FB715 .container-content .content-content,
    html[cro-pag="availability-nbfconf"] .FB715 .container-content .content-content {
        display: none;
    }

    @media screen and (max-width: 995px) {
        .FB715.container-message-promocode {
            bottom: 125px;
        }
    }

    @media screen and (max-width: 500px) {
        .FB715.container-message-promocode {
            left: 50%;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            width: 93.5vw;
            bottom: 24px;
        }

        html[cro-pag="availability-ns-conf"] .FB715.container-message-promocode {
            /*  bottom: 120px;*/
            width: 93.5vw;
        }

        html[cro-pag="availability-nbfconf"] .FB715.container-message-promocode {
            bottom: 180px;
        }
    }
</style>

<script>

    (function () {

        const device = document.querySelector('html').offsetWidth >= 500 ? 'des' : 'mob';

        const type = '1' // | "0_control";
        const interaccion = 'int'

        const flujo = 'NS' // DX || NS
        const analitycsElem = flujo == 'NS' ? 'dataLayer' : 'gtmDt'

        const numScript = '[FB715]'
        console.log(numScript)

        const copys = {
            cintillaConfirmacion: {
                mob: {
                    es: {
                        title: '¡Tarifas con descuento aplicado!',
                        content: 'Finaliza tu compra ahora y aprovecha esta oferta por tiempo limitado.',
                        confirm: 'El valor total ya tiene tu descuento aplicado, finaliza tu compra ahora'
                    },
                    en: {
                        title: 'Fares with discount applied!',
                        content: 'Complete your purchase now and enjoy this limited-time offer.',
                        confirm: 'Your discount is already applied. Complete your purchase now.'
                    },
                    pt: {
                        title: 'Tarifas com desconto aplicado!',
                        content: 'Finalize sua compra agora e aproveite esta oferta por tempo limitado.',
                        confirm: 'O valor total já tem seu desconto aplicado. Finalize sua compra agora.'
                    },
                    fr: {
                        title: '',
                        content: '',
                        confirm: ''
                    }
                },
                des: {
                    es: {
                        title: '¡Hemos aplicado el descuento a las tarifas!',
                        content: 'Finaliza tu compra ahora y aprovecha esta oferta por tiempo limitado.',
                        confirm: 'El valor total ya tiene tu descuento aplicado, finaliza tu compra ahora'
                    },
                    en: {
                        title: 'We have applied the discount to the fares!',
                        content: 'Complete your purchase now and enjoy this limited-time offer.',
                        confirm: 'Your discount is already applied. Complete your purchase now.'
                    },
                    pt: {
                        title: 'Aplicamos o desconto às tarifas!',
                        content: 'Finalize sua compra agora e aproveite esta oferta por tempo limitado.',
                        confirm: 'O valor total já tem seu desconto aplicado. Finalize sua compra agora.'
                    },
                    fr: {
                        title: '',
                        content: '',
                        confirm: ''
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        const preload = (maxIntents = 0) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (window.location.href.includes("accountcode=WEB") && (document.querySelector('journey-control-custom') || document.querySelector('avail-list-pres'))) {
                    orquestateFuncions();
                }
                else if (maxIntents > 75) {
                    console.log(numScript, 'Elements did not load')
                }
                else {
                    preload(++maxIntents)
                }
            }, 300);
        }

        const createNewMessage = () => {
            const containerMessage = document.createElement('div');
            containerMessage.classList.add('FB715');
            containerMessage.classList.add('container-message-promocode');
            containerMessage.classList.add('hidden');

            const iconMessage = document.createElement('div');
            iconMessage.classList.add('icon-message');

            const containerContent = document.createElement('div');
            containerContent.classList.add('container-content');

            const titleContent = document.createElement('div');
            titleContent.classList.add('title-content');
            titleContent.textContent = copys['cintillaConfirmacion'][device][getLang()]['title']

            const contentContent = document.createElement('div')
            contentContent.classList.add('content-content');
            contentContent.textContent = copys['cintillaConfirmacion'][device][getLang()]['content']

            containerContent.appendChild(titleContent);
            containerContent.appendChild(contentContent);

            const iconCloseMessage = document.createElement('div');
            iconCloseMessage.classList.add('icon-close');

            iconCloseMessage.addEventListener('click', () => {
                closed = true;
                document.querySelector('.FB715.container-message-promocode').classList.add('hidden');
                setTimeout(() => {
                    const elems = document.querySelectorAll('.FB715.container-message-promocode');
                    for (const elem of elems) {
                        elem.remove();
                    }
                }, 500)

            })

            containerMessage.appendChild(iconMessage);
            containerMessage.appendChild(containerContent);
            containerMessage.appendChild(iconCloseMessage);

            if (!document.querySelector('.FB715.container-message-promocode')) {
                document.body.appendChild(containerMessage);
                removeAfterSixSecounds();
            }
        }

        const removeAfterSixSecounds = () => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                closed = true;
                document.querySelector('.FB715.container-message-promocode').classList.add('hidden');
                setTimeout(() => {
                    const elems = document.querySelectorAll('.FB715.container-message-promocode');
                    for (const elem of elems) {
                        elem.remove();
                    }
                }, 500)
            }, 7000);
        }

        let closed = false;
        let showedOb = false;
        let showedIb = false;
        let showedObIbConfirmation = false;

        const orquestateFuncions = () => {

            createNewMessage();

            const pageBefore = getPageID();
            let intervalMessage = setInterval(() => {
                if (window.location.href.includes('https://booking.avianca.com/av/booking') == true && pageBefore != 'availability-nbfob' && pageBefore != 'availability-nbfib' && pageBefore != 'availability-nbfconf') {
                    console.warn(numScript, 'Concluying script')
                    clearInterval(intervalMessage);

                }
                else {
                    const loading = document.querySelector('div.page-loader_inner') ? document.querySelector('div.page-loader_inner') : document.querySelector('img.loading-image');
                    if (!loading && showedOb == false && (getPageID() == 'availability-ns-ob' || getPageID() == 'availability-nbfob')) {
                        showedOb = true;
                        document.querySelector('.FB715.container-message-promocode').classList.remove('hidden');
                    }

                    if (!loading && showedIb == false && getPageID() == 'availability-ns-ib') {
                        showedIb = true;
                        //document.querySelector('.FB715.container-message-promocode').classList.remove('hidden');
                        setTimeout(() => {
                            if (!document.querySelector('.FB715.container-message-promocode')) {
                                createNewMessage();
                                setTimeout(() => {
                                    document.querySelector('.FB715.container-message-promocode').classList.remove('hidden');
                                    //clearInterval(intervalMessage);
                                }, 500);
                            }
                        }, 1000);
                    }

                    if (showedObIbConfirmation == false && (getPageID() == 'availability-ns-conf' || getPageID() == 'availability-nbfib')) {
                        if (document.querySelector('.FB715.container-message-promocode')) {
                            updateCopys();
                        }
                    }

                    if (!loading && showedObIbConfirmation == false && (getPageID() == 'availability-ns-conf' || getPageID() == 'availability-nbfconf')) {
                        showedObIbConfirmation = true;

                        if (document.querySelector('.FB715.container-message-promocode')) {
                            updateCopys();
                        }

                        setTimeout(() => {
                            if (document.querySelector('.FB715.container-message-promocode')) {
                                updateCopys();
                            }
                            else {
                                createNewMessage();
                                updateCopys();
                                setTimeout(() => {
                                    document.querySelector('.FB715.container-message-promocode').classList.remove('hidden');
                                    //clearInterval(intervalMessage);
                                }, 500);
                            }
                        }, 1000);
                    }
                }
            }, 1000);
        }

        const updateCopys = () => {
            console.log(numScript, 'Updated!')
            const messagesContainer = document.querySelector('.FB715.container-message-promocode');

            const title = messagesContainer.querySelector('.title-content');
            if (title.textContent != copys['cintillaConfirmacion'][device][getLang()]['confirm'])
                title.textContent = copys['cintillaConfirmacion'][device][getLang()]['confirm']
            //const content = messagesContainer.querySelector('.content-content');
            //content.innerHTML = '';
        }

        const getLang = () => {
            if (document.querySelector('html').getAttribute('cro-lang'))
                return document.querySelector('html').getAttribute('cro-lang').split('-').pop().toLowerCase();
            else
                return document.querySelector('html').getAttribute('lang').split('-')[0].toLowerCase();
        }

        const getPageID = () => {
            return document.querySelector('html').getAttribute('cro-pag')
        }

        const trackEvents = identificador => {
            const pushClickanalitycs = e => { let a = "AT_583255_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; fbMessage(" ANALITYCS: ", a), window[analitycsElem].push({ event: "sendTargetEvent", target_action: a }) }, trackEvent = (e, a) => { let t = "AT_583255_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; fbMessage(" MBOX: ", t), adobe.target.getOffer({ mbox: t, type: type, params: { ATFunctionName: "adobe.target.getOffer", campaignId: "583255", "audienceReport_583255": !1 }, success: () => { "function" == typeof a && a() }, error: (e, a) => { console.error("conv -> trackEvent Request failed", e, a) } }) };
            // trackEvent(identificador, "click");
            pushClickanalitycs(identificador)
        }

        setTimeout(() => {
            preload(0)
        }, 1000);


    })()

</script>

<style>
    @media screen and (min-width: 1024px) {}

    @media screen and (max-width: 1023px) {}
</style>

<script>

    (function () {

        /* Identificador actividad */
        const numScript = "[FB724]";
        console.log(numScript);

        /* Información General */
        let device = document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth >= 1025 ? 'des' : 'mob';
        const type = "1";
        const visualizacion = "vis";
        const interaccion = "int";
        const analitycsElem = "dataLayer";

        const preload = (maxIntents) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (document.querySelector("body")) {
                    validatePage();
                }
                else if (maxIntents == 75) {
                    console.warn(numScript, "Elem didn't load");
                }
                else {
                    maxIntents++;
                    preload(maxIntents);
                }
            }, 300);
        }

        const validatePage = () => {
            let url = window.location.href;
            if (url.includes("utm_campaign=voucher_avcredits")) {
                sessionStorage.setItem("user_avcredits", "true");
                console.log(numScript, " User from avcredits")
            } else {

<style>
    @media screen and (min-width: 1024px) {}

    @media screen and (max-width: 1023px) {}

    @media screen and (min-width: 767px) {
        .journey-selected .journey_journey-schedule .journey-schedule {
            padding-top: 4rem !important;
        }

        .journey-selected .journey_price .journey_price_button,
        .journey-selected .journey-schedule_carriers {
            padding-top: 2.2rem !important;
        }
    }

    .journey_journey-schedule {
        cursor: pointer;
    }
</style>

<script>
    (function () {
        let device = document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth >= 990 ? "des" : "mob";
        const type = "1"; // | "0_control";
        const visualizacion = "vis";
        const interaccion = "int";
        const flujo = "NS"; // DX
        const analitycsElem = flujo == "NS" ? "dataLayer" : "gtmDt";

        const numScript = "[FB574]";
        console.log(numScript);

        const preload = (maxIntents) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (document.querySelector('div.journey_inner')) {
                    let page =
                        setInterval(() => {
                            modifyPage();
                        }, 1000);
                }
                else if (maxIntents == 75) {
                    console.warn(numScript, "Elem didn't load");
                }
                else {
                    maxIntents++;
                    preload(maxIntents);
                }
            }, 500);
        }

        sessionStorage.setItem("click_box_left", "false")

        const modifyPage = () => {
            const elem = document.querySelector('div.journey_inner');
            const pricebtn = document.querySelectorAll(".journey_price_button");
            const journeyResumebtn = document.querySelectorAll(".journey-schedule_duration_time-connections");
            const schedulebtn = document.querySelectorAll(".journey_journey-schedule");
            const selectedJourneys = document.querySelectorAll(".journey_price_button-selected");

            if (!elem.classList.contains('FB574')) {
                elem.classList.add('FB574');
                for (i = 0; i < schedulebtn.length; i++) {
                    addClickEvent(journeyResumebtn[i], schedulebtn[i], pricebtn[i]);
                }
            }

            for (const journey of selectedJourneys) {
                if (journey.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.querySelector(".journey_fares")) {
                    // Delete the fares
                    journey.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.querySelector(".journey_fares").remove();

                    // console.log(journey)
                    // console.log(selectedJourneys)
                    // let elem = journey.parentElement.parentElement
                    // let elem = journey.parentElement
                    // let newElem = elem.cloneNode(true);
                    // let parentElem = elem.parentNode
                    // parentElem.replaceChild(newElem, elem);

                    // parentElem.insertBefore(newElem, elem.nextSibling);
                    
                    // newElem.querySelector(".connections_trigger_button").addEventListener("click", () => {
                        // console.log("click en resumen de itinerario")
                        // console.log(elem)
                        // elem.querySelector(".connections_trigger_button").click();
                    // })
                    
                    // elem.setAttribute("style", "display:none");
                }
            }
        }

        const addClickEvent = (journeyResumebtn, schedulebtn, pricebtn) => {
            if (!pricebtn.classList.contains("journey_price_button-selected")) {
                journeyResumebtn.addEventListener("click", () => { event.stopPropagation(); });
                schedulebtn.addEventListener("click", () => {
                    sessionStorage.setItem("click_box_left", "true")
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        pricebtn.click()
                    }, 100);

                    trackEvents("box-left-flight_" + getPageID())
                    useFullstory();
                });
                pricebtn.addEventListener("click", () => {
                    if (sessionStorage.getItem("click_box_left") != "true") {
                        trackEvents("box-right-flight_" + getPageID())
                        useFullstory()
                    }
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        sessionStorage.setItem("click_box_left", "false")
                    }, 200);
                })
            }
        }

        const createElem = (newClass) => {
            const newElem = document.createElement("div");
            newElem.setAttribute("class", newClass);
            return newElem;
        };

        const getLang = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("lang");
        };

        const getPageID = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pag");
        };

        const getPos = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pos").toLowerCase();
        };

        const useFullstory = () => {
            if (typeof FS !== "undefined") {
                FS.event("AT_565288", {
                    campaignId: "565288",
                    campaignRecipeId: "0",
                    offerId: "2222924",
                });
            }
        };

        const trackEvents = (identificador) => {
            const pushClickanalitycs = e => { let t = "AT_565288_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " ANALITYCS: ", t), window[analitycsElem].push({ event: "sendTargetEvent", target_action: t }) }, trackEvent = (e, t) => { let a = "AT_565288_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " MBOX: ", a), adobe.target.getOffer({ mbox: a, type: type, params: { ATFunctionName: "adobe.target.getOffer", campaignId: "565288", "audienceReport_565288": !1 }, success() { "function" == typeof t && t() }, error(e, t) { console.error("conv -> trackEvent Request failed", e, t) } }) };
            //try { trackEvent(identificador, "click"); } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to adobe: ", error); }
            try { pushClickanalitycs(identificador); } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to analitycs: ", error); }
        };

        if (device == "des" || device == "mob")
            preload(0);
    })();
</script>

    .insignia-aplicable .fb-pill-mixed-fly-xxl {

    .journey-selector.has-fare6 .journey-selected .insignia-aplicable .journey_price_fare_name {

    }

    .journey-selector.has-fare6 .journey-selected .insignia-aplicable .journey_price_fare_name .journey_price_fare_name-text {
        height: 0px;
        margin: 0;

    }

    .journey-selector.has-fare6 .journey-selected .insignia-aplicable .journey_price_fare_name .journey_price_fare_name-text::before {
        content: 'insignia';
        display: flex;
        height: 0;
        width: -webkit-fill-available;
        visibility: visible;
    }

    @media screen and (min-width: 990px) {

        .insignia-aplicable .fb-pill-mixed-fly-xxl:hover::after,
        .insignia-aplicable .fb-pill-mixed-fly-xxl:focus::after {
            left: -1px !important;
            top: 40px !important;
        }
    }

    @media screen and (max-width: 990px) {
        .insignia-aplicable .journey_fares_container--horizontal .fare-control.fare6::after {
            content: none;
        }

        .insignia-aplicable .journey_fares_container--horizontal .fare-control.fare6 {
            background: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,);
            background-size: cover;
            background-position: center;
            background-repeat: no-repeat;
        }

        html body .insignia-aplicable .fb-pill-mixed-fly-xxl:hover::after {
            top: 39px !important;
            left: -150px !important;
            width: 231px;
        }
    }

    @media screen and (max-width: 990px) and (min-width : 480px) {
        .insignia-aplicable .fb-pill-mixed-fly-selected {
            margin-left: 53%;
        }
    }

    @media screen and (max-width: 639px) {
        .new-av-facelit-target .journey-select_list_item--selected .insignia-aplicable .journey-schedule_container.has-available-carriers .fare-selected-pill-details.business {
            background: linear-gradient(272.93deg, #7C2F11 9.2%, #5D0000 50.62%, #3F141D 105.16%);
            color: white;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            height: 19px;
            width: 87px;
            margin-top: -3px;
        }

        .new-av-facelit-target .journey-select_list_item--selected .insignia-aplicable .journey-schedule_container.has-available-carriers .fare-selected-pill-details.business .fare-selected-name {
            height: 0px;
