            visibility: hidden;
        }

        .new-av-facelit-target .journey-select_list_item--selected .insignia-aplicable .journey-schedule_container.has-available-carriers .fare-selected-pill-details.business .fare-selected-name::before {
            content: 'insignia';
            display: flex;
            position: relative;
            height: auto;
            width: -webkit-fill-available;
            visibility: visible;
            top: -9px;
        }

        .new-av-facelit-target .journey-select_list_item--selected .insignia-aplicable .journey-schedule_container.has-available-carriers .fare-selected-pill-details.business .selected-pill-icon {
            background-image: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,);
        }

        .insignia-aplicable-modal.fare-resume-container.business .fare-resume-modal-content .item-icon,
        .insignia-aplicable-modal .name {
            background: linear-gradient(100deg, #3F141D, #5D0000, #7C2F11);
            background-clip: text;
            color: transparent !important;
        }

        .insignia-aplicable-modal.fare-resume-container.business .fare-resume-modal-content .item-icon.itinerary-item {
            background: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,) !important;
        }
    }
</style>

<script>

    (function () {
        const numScript = "[FB775]";
        console.log(numScript);

        let device = document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth >= 990 ? 'des' : 'mob';
        const type = "1";
        const visualizacion = "vis";
        const interaccion = "int";
        const analitycsElem = "dataLayer";

        const copys = {
            es: {
                titleInsignia: 'Insignia',
                subtitleInsignia: 'business class',
                menuItem: "Menú de alta cocina",
                priorityService: 'Disfruta de un servicio prioritario',
                lifemiles: 'Recibe 7 lifemiles por cada USD',
                mixedCabin: 'La experiencia INSIGNIA (asiento y menú) solo está disponible para el trayecto REPLACE-ORIGIN - REPLACE-DESTINY.',
                modalBusinessMenu: 'Menú premium incluido',
            },
            en: {
                titleInsignia: 'Insignia',
                subtitleInsignia: 'business class',
                menuItem: "Fine cuisine menu",
                priorityService: 'Enjoy priority service',
                lifemiles: 'Earn 7 lifemiles for every USD',
                mixedCabin: 'INSIGNIA experience (seat and menu) is only available for the REPLACE-ORIGIN - REPLACE-DESTINY.',
                modalBusinessMenu: 'Premium menu included',
            },
            pt: {
                titleInsignia: 'Insignia',
                subtitleInsignia: 'business class',
                menuItem: "Menú de alta cozinha",
                priorityService: 'Aproveite um serviço prioritário',
                lifemiles: 'Acumula 7 lifemiles por USD',
                mixedCabin: 'A experiência da INSIGNIA (assento e menu) está disponível apenas para o voo REPLACE-ORIGIN - REPLACE-DESTINY.',
                modalBusinessMenu: 'Menu premium incluido',
            },
            fr: {
                titleInsignia: 'Insignia',
                subtitleInsignia: 'business class',
                menuItem: "Menu gastronomique",
                priorityService: "Profitez d'un service prioritaire",
                lifemiles: 'Accumulez 7 lifemiles par USD',
                mixedCabin: "L’expérience en INSIGNIA (siège et menu) est uniquement disponible pour le trajet REPLACE-ORIGIN - REPLACE-DESTINY.",
                modalBusinessMenu: 'Menu à bord',
            }
        }

        const validRoutes = ["BOGMAD", "MADBOG", "BOGBCN", "BCNBOG", "BOGLHR", "LHRBOG", "BOGCDG", "CDGBOG", "MDEMAD", "MADMDE", "CLOMAD", "MADCLO", "SALMAD", "MADSAL"];

        const preload = (maxIntents) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (document.querySelector(".journey-select_container")) {
                    modifyInsignia();
                } else if (maxIntents == 75) {
                    console.warn(numScript, "Elem didn't load");
                } else {
                    maxIntents++;
                    preload(maxIntents);
                }
            }, 300);
        }

        const modifyInsignia = () => {
            setInterval(() => {
                modifyCart();
                let flights = document.querySelectorAll(".journey-select_list .journey");
                for (const flight of flights) {
                    if (!flight.classList.contains("insignia-reviewer")) {
                        flight.classList.add("insignia-reviewer");

                        let segments = flight.querySelectorAll(".connections_journeys .connections_journeys_group");
                        if (segments.length > 1) {
                            flight.classList.add("insignia-with-connection");
                        }
                        for (const segment of segments) {
                            let validSegment = validateSegments(segment)
                            if (validSegment) {
                                if (!flight.classList.contains("insignia-aplicable")) {
                                    flight.className += validSegment.classAdder;
                                    createStyleMixedCabinMenuModifier(validSegment);
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }

                let title = document.querySelector(".insignia-aplicable .fare6 .fare_name");
                if (title && title.textContent != copys[getLang()].titleInsignia) {
                    title.textContent = copys[getLang()].titleInsignia;
                }

                let subtitle = document.querySelector(".insignia-aplicable .fare6 .subtitle");
                if (subtitle && subtitle.textContent != copys[getLang()].subtitleInsignia) {
                    subtitle.textContent = copys[getLang()].subtitleInsignia;
                }

                let atributes = document.querySelectorAll(".insignia-aplicable .fare6 .fare_list li .fare_list_item_description");
                if (atributes.length == 9) {
                    // atributes[4].textContent = copys[getLang()].priorityService
                    // Dejaremos de modificar el elemento "6" lifemiles
                    // atributes[6].textContent = copys[getLang()].lifemiles
                    atributes[3].textContent = copys[getLang()].menuItem
                }

                if (document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth <= 639) {
                    let insigniaSelected = document.querySelectorAll(".new-av-facelit-target .journey-select_list_item--selected .insignia-aplicable .journey-schedule_container.has-available-carriers .fare-selected-pill-details.business");
                    for (const selected of insigniaSelected) {
                        if (!selected.classList.contains("insignia-click-reviewer-facelift")) {
                            selected.classList.add("insignia-click-reviewer-facelift");
                            selected.addEventListener("click", () => {
                                modifyModalResume();
                            })
                        }
                    }
                }
            }, 1000);
        }

        const modifyCart = () => {
            let cart = document.querySelector(".summary_total_list .summary_trigger");
            if (cart && !cart.classList.contains("eventTaggerInsignia")) {
                cart.classList.add("eventTaggerInsignia");

                cart.addEventListener("click", () => {
                    let info = getInfo();
                    if (info.length == 1) {
                        readData(info, 0);
                    } else if (info.length == 2) {
                        readData(info, 0);
                        readData(info, 1);
                    }
                })
            }
        }

        const readData = (info, position) => {
            let data = info[position].segments
            for (const segment of data) {
                let origen = segment.origin;
                let destino = segment.destination;
                let completeRoute = origen + destino;
                if (validRoutes.includes(completeRoute)) {
                    document.querySelectorAll(".summmary_journeys_item")[position].classList.add("insignia-aplicable-cart");
                }
            }
        }

        const getInfo = () => {
            return JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("AV-sessionData"))._value.session.booking.journeys;
        }

        const modifyModalResume = () => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                let modal = document.querySelector(".fare-resume-container.business");
                modal ? modal.classList.add("insignia-aplicable-modal") : null
                let name = modal.querySelector(".name")
                name ? name.textContent = copys[getLang()].titleInsignia.toUpperCase() : null;
                let menu = modal.querySelector(".menu-item");
                if (menu) {
                    let elem = menu.parentElement.querySelector(".item-text")
                    elem.textContent = elem.textContent.replace(copys[getLang()].modalBusinessMenu, copys[getLang()].menuItem);
                }
            }, 50);
        }

        const createStyleMixedCabinMenuModifier = (info) => {
            let classReplacer = info.classAdder.replaceAll(" ", ".");
            let styles = `
                REPLACE-CLASS .fb-pill-mixed-fly-selected-xxl:hover::after,
                REPLACE-CLASS .fb-pill-mixed-fly-selected-xxl:focus::after,
                REPLACE-CLASS .fb-pill-mixed-fly-xxl:hover::after,
                REPLACE-CLASS .fb-pill-mixed-fly-xxl:focus::after {
                    content: 'REPLACE-CONTENT-MIXED-CABIN' !important;
                }

                .insignia-aplicable div[aria-label="Click to select business fare"] {
                    & ul.fare_list {
                        & li:nth-child(4) {
                            & .fare_list_item_icon:before {
                                content: 'REPLACE-MENU' !important;
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }

                REPLACE-CLASS.insignia-with-connection div[aria-label="Click to select business fare"] {
                    & ul.fare_list {
                        & li:nth-child(4) {
                            & .fare_list_item_icon:before {
                                content: 'REPLACE-MENU (REPLACE-ORIGIN-OD - REPLACE-DESTINY-OD)' !important;
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            `

            styles = styles
                .split("REPLACE-CONTENT-MIXED-CABIN").join(copys[getLang()].mixedCabin)
                .split('REPLACE-ORIGIN-OD').join(info.origen)
                .split('REPLACE-DESTINY-OD').join(info.destino)
                .split('REPLACE-ORIGIN').join(info.aeropuertoOrigen)
                .split('REPLACE-DESTINY').join(info.aeropuertoDestino)
                .split('REPLACE-MENU').join(copys[getLang()].menuItem)
                .replaceAll('REPLACE-CLASS', classReplacer);


            let css = document.createElement("style");
            css.setAttribute("data-type-insignia-for", classReplacer);
            css.type = 'text/css';

            if (css.styleSheet) {
                css.styleSheet.cssText = styles
            }
            else {
                css.appendChild(document.createTextNode(styles))
            }

            if (!document.querySelector("style[data-type-insignia-for='" + classReplacer + "']")) {
                document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(css);
            }
        }

        const createPillToBundleXXLSelected = (originAiport, destinyAirport, contadorSelected) => {
            let styles = `
                
            `
            styles = styles.split('REPLACE-ORIGIN').join(originAiport).split('REPLACE-DESTINY').join(destinyAirport).split('REPLACE-NUMBER').join(contadorSelected)

            let css = document.createElement("style");
            css.type = 'text/css';

            if (css.styleSheet) {
                css.styleSheet.cssText = styles
            }
            else {
                css.appendChild(document.createTextNode(styles))
            }

            document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(css);
        }

        const validateSegments = (segment) => {
            let journeys = segment.querySelectorAll(".connections_journeys_group_item.connections_journey .station");
            let origin = journeys[0].querySelector(".station-code").textContent.toUpperCase();
            let destiny = journeys[1].querySelector(".station-code").textContent.toUpperCase();
            let route = origin + destiny;
            let nameOrigin = journeys[0].textContent.slice(0, -4);
            let nameDestiny = journeys[1].textContent.slice(0, -4);
            let classToAdd = validRoutes.includes(route) ? " insignia-aplicable insignia-on-" + route : false;

            let info = {
                classAdder: classToAdd,
                origen: origin,
                destino: destiny,
                aeropuertoOrigen: nameOrigin,
                aeropuertoDestino: nameDestiny,
                ruta: route
            }
            return classToAdd ? info : false;
        }

        const getUrlParam = (param) => {
            const params = window.location.search
            const url = new URLSearchParams(params)
            return url.get(param);
        }

        const validRouteURL = () => {
            let origin = getUrlParam("origin1");
            let destination = getUrlParam("destination1");
            let route = origin + destination;
            let inverseRoute = destination + origin;
            return validRoutes.includes(route) || validRoutes.includes(inverseRoute);
        }

        const getLang = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("lang");
        }

        const getPageID = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pag").toLowerCase();
        }

        const getPos = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pos").toLowerCase();
        }

        const createElem = (newClass) => {
            const newElem = document.createElement("div");
            newElem.setAttribute("class", newClass);
            return newElem;
        };

        const useFullstory = () => {
            if (typeof FS !== 'undefined') {
                FS.event('AT_591276', {
                    campaignId: '591276',
                    campaignRecipeId: '0',
                    offerId: '2168344'
                })
            }
        }

        const trackEvents = (identificador) => {
            const pushClickanalitycs = e => { let t = "AT_591276_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " ANALITYCS: ", t), window[analitycsElem].push({ event: "sendTargetEvent", target_action: t }) }, trackEvent = (e, t) => { let a = "AT_591276_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " MBOX: ", a), adobe.target.getOffer({ mbox: a, type: type, params: { ATFunctionName: "adobe.target.getOffer", campaignId: "591276", "audienceReport_591276": !1 }, success: () => { "function" == typeof t && t() }, error: (e, t) => { console.error("conv -> trackEvent Request failed", e, t) } }) };
            // try { trackEvent(identificador, "click"); } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to adobe: ", error); }
            try { pushClickanalitycs(identificador) } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to analitycs: ", error); }
        }

        if (device == "des" || device == "mob")
            preload(0);

    })();

</script>

<style>
    .FB813-wamos-logo {
        width: 50px;
        height: auto !important;

    }


    @media only screen and (max-width: 991px) {
        .journey-schedule_carriers .carrier {
            display: flex;
        }
    }

    span.FB813ParaAvianca {
        font-size: 12px;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-weight: bold;
    }

    .journey-schedule_carriers.ng-star-inserted {
        width: 5rem !important;
        margin: 0 auto !important;
    }

    .journey-schedule_carriers_title.ng-star-inserted,
    .journey-schedule_carriers_item.ng-star-inserted{
        margin: 0 !important;
    }


    .journey-selected .journey_journey-schedule .journey-schedule_carriers.ng-star-inserted{
        margin-top: 2rem !important;
        padding-top: 0 !important;
    }

    .journey-selected .journey_price .journey_price_button {
        padding-top: 2rem !important;
    }
</style>



<script>

    (function () {
        const copys = {
            es: 'para avianca',
            en: 'for avianca',
            pt: 'para avianca',
            fr: 'pour avianca'
        }

        const ArrayRutasWamos = ["BOGEZE", "BOGSCL", "EZEBOG", "SCLBOG"];

        let validarRutaWamos = false;

        const device = document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth >= 770 ? "des" : "mob";
        const page = document.documentElement.getAttribute("cro-pag");
        const type = "1"; // | "0_control";
        const interaccion = "int";

        const flujo = "NBF"; // DX || NBF
        const analitycsElem = flujo == "NBF" ? "dataLayer" : "gtmDt";
        const numScript = "[FB813]";
        console.log(numScript);

        const wamosLogo = 'data:image/png;base64,';

        const preload = (maxIntents) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (document.querySelector(".journey-select_list") && document.querySelector(".journey-control")) {
                    modifyPage();
                } else if (maxIntents == 75) {
                    console.warn(numScript, "Elem didn't load");
                } else {
                    maxIntents++;
                    preload(maxIntents);
                }
            }, 300);
        };

        const modifyPage = () => {
            document.querySelector("div.journey_inner").classList.add("FB813");
            checkTransportCode();
            const intervalFlights = setInterval(() => {
                const elem = document.querySelector("div.journey_inner");

                if (elem && !elem.classList.contains("FB813")) {
                    elem.classList.add("FB813");
                    checkTransportCode();
                }
            }, 1000);
        };



        const checkTransportCode = () => {
            const flights = document.querySelectorAll(".journey_inner");
            for (const flight of flights) {

                const connections = flight.querySelector(".connections_journeys");

                if (!connections) continue;

                const transit = connections.querySelectorAll(".connections_transit");

                validaRutas(flight, transit);

                for (const item of transit) {

                    const codeFlight = item.querySelector(".transport-cabin");
                    if (!codeFlight) continue;

                    if (codeFlight.innerHTML.includes("A330-300") && validarRutaWamos) {
                        // Agregar la clase FB813 siempre que se cumple la condición
                        const addClasses = document.querySelectorAll(".journey-schedule_container.ng-star-inserted");
                        addClasses.forEach(addClass => {
                            if (!addClass.classList.contains('has-available-carriers')) {
                                addClass.classList.add('has-available-carriers');
                            }
                        });


                        //tomamos el hover de cada vuelo y le dan stilos
                        let cons = flight.querySelector(".connections_data_body");
                        if (cons) {
                            cons.setAttribute("style", "padding: 0.3125rem 0.6rem 2.0625rem;");
                        }

                        //remplazamos el icono del logo en el hover por el de wamos
                        const logo = item.querySelector("img");
                        if (logo) {
                            logo.classList.add("FB813-wamos-logo");
                            logo.setAttribute("src", wamosLogo);
                            logo.setAttribute("alt", "Wamos");
                        }


                        //Replaza el Logo de Avianca por el de Wamos si no tien escala
                        if (transit.length === 1) {
                            const flightCarrierLogo = flight.querySelector(".journey-schedule_carriers .carrier_img img");
                            if (flightCarrierLogo) {
                                flightCarrierLogo.classList.add("FB813-wamos-logo");
                                flightCarrierLogo.setAttribute("src", wamosLogo);
                                flightCarrierLogo.setAttribute("alt", "Wamos");
                            }
                        }

                        //Replaza el Logo de Avianca por el de Wamos si tien escala
                        if (transit.length > 1) {
                            const flightCarriers = flight.querySelector(".journey-schedule_carriers .carrier");

                            if (flightCarriers) {
                                const wamosImgContainer = document.createElement("div");
                                const wamosImgElement = document.createElement("img");
                                wamosImgContainer.classList.add("carrier_img");
                                wamosImgElement.classList.add("FB813-wamos-logo");
                                wamosImgElement.setAttribute("src", wamosLogo);
                                wamosImgElement.setAttribute("alt", "Wamos");
                                wamosImgContainer.appendChild(wamosImgElement);
                                flightCarriers.appendChild(wamosImgContainer);
                            }
                        }

                        /*
                        const journeySelectList = document.querySelector(".journey-select_list");
                        if (journeySelectList && !journeySelectList.classList.contains("FB249")) {
                            journeySelectList.classList.add("FB249");
                            trackEvents("wamos-logo");
                            pushFullStory("wamos-logo");
                        }*/

                        const carriers = flight.querySelector(".journey-schedule_carriers");
                        if (carriers && !carriers.querySelector(".FB813-wamos-logo")) {
                            const wamosImg = document.createElement("img");
                            wamosImg.classList.add("FB813-wamos-logo");
                            wamosImg.setAttribute("src", wamosLogo);
                            wamosImg.setAttribute("alt", "Wamos");
                            carriers.appendChild(wamosImg);
                        }



                    }
                }
                creaParaAvianca(flight);
            }
        };



        const validaRutas = (flight, transit) => {
            if (transit.length == 1) {

                const allConections = flight.querySelectorAll('ul.connections_journeys_group');

                const conection = allConections[0];
                const origin = conection.querySelectorAll('span.station-code')[0].textContent
                const arrival = conection.querySelectorAll('span.station-code')[1].textContent
                if (ArrayRutasWamos.includes(origin + arrival)) {
                    validarRutaWamos = true;
                } else {
                    validarRutaWamos = false;
                }

            } else if (transit.length > 1) {

                const allConections = flight.querySelectorAll('ul.connections_journeys_group');


                for (const element of allConections) {

                    const origin = element.querySelectorAll('span.station-code')[0].textContent;
                    const arrival = element.querySelectorAll('span.station-code')[1].textContent;

                    if (ArrayRutasWamos.includes(origin + arrival)) {
                        validarRutaWamos = true;
                    } else {
                        validarRutaWamos = false;
                    }

                }

            }

        }

        const creaParaAvianca = (flight) => {
            let nodoWamos = flight.querySelectorAll("img.FB813-wamos-logo");
            if (nodoWamos.length > 0) {
                let padreDirecto = nodoWamos[1].parentElement;
                let containerTextWamos = document.createElement("span");
                containerTextWamos.classList.add("FB813ParaAvianca");
                containerTextWamos.textContent = copys[getLang()];
                padreDirecto.appendChild(containerTextWamos);
            }
        }

        const getPageID = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pag");
        };

        const getLang = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("lang").toLowerCase();
        };

        if (device == "des" || device == "mob") preload(0);

    })();

</script>

<style>
    .currency-switch-container-home {
        width: auto;
        flex-shrink: 0;
        display: inline-flex;
        align-items: center;
        height: 40px;
    }

    .currency-switch {
        padding: 5px;
        padding-left: 3px;
        padding-right: 7px;
        border-radius: 20px;
        background: #FFF;
        width: fit-content;
        margin-left: 12px;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
        flex-shrink: 0;
        position: relative;
        height: -webkit-fill-available;
    }

    html[cro-pag="availability-ns-conf"] .currency-switch-container-availability {
        display: none;
    }

    .currency-switch-container-availability {
        position: absolute;
        display: block;
        right: 0;
    }

    .NS023 {
        padding-top: 40px;
    }

    .currency-switch--availability {
        border-radius: 20px;
        background: #FFF;
        box-shadow: 0px 0px 6px 0px rgba(27, 27, 27, 0.20);
        display: flex;
        width: -webkit-fill-available;
        height: 40px;
        padding: 7px;
        gap: 8px;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        border: none;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .image-switch {
        width: 100%;
        height: 13.3px;
        display: flex;
        /* margin-left: 2px; */
    }

    .currency-switch .currency-option,
    .currency-switch--availability .currency-option {
        cursor: pointer;
        font-family: "Red Hat Display";
        font-size: 14px;
        margin: 0 4px;
        border-radius: 32px;
        border: 1px solid #FFF;
        background: #FFF;
        transition: all 0.4s ease;
        color: #000;
        text-align: center;
        font-style: normal;
        line-height: normal;
        display: flex;
        width: 61px;
        height: 26px;
        padding: 8px 12px;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
        box-sizing: border-box;
    }

    .currency-switch--availability .currency-option {
        margin: 0;
    }

    .currency-switch--availability .currency-option.selected,
    .currency-switch .currency-option.selected {
        border: 1.5px solid #23C847;
        background: rgba(35, 200, 71, 0.05);
        font-weight: 700;
    }

    .currency-switch--availability .currency-option:not(.selected):focus,
    .currency-switch .currency-option:not(.selected):focus,
    .currency-switch--availability .currency-option:not(.selected):hover,
    .currency-switch .currency-option:not(.selected):hover {
        box-shadow: 0px 2px 12px 0px rgba(27, 27, 27, 0.15);
        border: 0.8px solid #25D366;
    }

    .currency-switch .currency-option:active,
    .currency-switch--availability .currency-option:active {
        border: 1px solid #23C847;
        background: #23C847;
        color: #fff;
        font-weight: 700;
    }

    .tooltip-container {
        position: absolute;
        display: flex;
        padding: 16px;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 10px;
        align-self: stretch;
        border-radius: 8px;
        background: #1B1B1B;
        transition: all 0.4s ease;
        width: max-content;
        top: -56px;
        left: 90%;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
    }

    .tooltip-text {
        color: #FFF;
        font-feature-settings: 'liga' off, 'clig' off;
        font-family: "Red Hat Display";
        font-size: 14px;
        font-style: normal;
        font-weight: 400;
        line-height: normal;
    }

    .arrow-tooltip {
        position: absolute;
        transition: all 0.4s ease;
        top: -10px;
        left: 84%;
    }
</style>

<script>

    (function () {
        let device = document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth >= 1025 ? "des" : "mob";
        const type = "1"; // | "0_control";
        const visualizacion = "vis";
        const interaccion = "int";

        const flujo = "NS"; // DX
        const analitycsElem = flujo == "NS" ? "dataLayer" : "gtmDt";

        const numScript = "[NS035]";
        console.log(numScript, " - Version B");

        const copys = {
            es: "Compra en la moneda de tu preferencia",
            en: "Select in the currency of your choice.",
            pt: "Compre na moeda de sua preferência",
            fr: "Achète dans la devise de ton choix",
        };

        const preload = (maxIntents = 0) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                const availabilityElement = document.querySelector(".journey-selector.journey-selector-outbound");
                const parent = document.querySelector(".ibe-search_content-top");
                const pos = getPos();

                if (!window.location.href.includes("booking") && pos && parent) {
                    if (pos.toLowerCase() == "ar" || (pos.toLowerCase() == "otr" && sessionStorage.getItem("FB665-homeSwitch") == "USD")) {
                        if (pos.toLowerCase() == "ar") {
                            limpiarSessionStorage();
                        }
                        switchHome();
                    }
                } else if (window.location.href.includes("booking") && gottaRechargePage()) {
                    rechargePage();
                } else if (window.location.href.includes("booking") && pos && availabilityElement) {
                    if (sessionStorage.getItem("FB665Switch") != null || pos.toLowerCase() == 'ar') {
                        if (sessionStorage.getItem("FB665Switch") == null) {
                            let tripTypePage = window.location.href.includes("origin2") ? 'RT' : 'OW'
                            let dataSearched = {
                                pos: 'ar',
                                tripType: tripTypePage,
                                originalSearch: 'ARS',
                                selectedOption: 'ARS',
                            };
                            saveData(dataSearched);
                        }
                        const dataSearched = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("FB665Switch"));
                        trackearEventos(dataSearched);
                        switchAvailability();
                        useFullstory();
                    }
                } else if (maxIntents >= 75) {
                    console.warn(numScript, "Element(s) didn't load after multiple attempts.");
                } else {
                    preload(maxIntents++);
                }
            }, 300);
        };

        const limpiarSessionStorage = () => {
            sessionStorage.removeItem("FB665Switch");
            sessionStorage.removeItem("FB665-homeSwitch");
        }

        const switchHome = () => {
            const homeDiv = document.querySelector(".ibe-search_content-top");
            if (!homeDiv || document.querySelector(".currency-switch-container-home")) {
                return;
            }
            trackEvents('Visualizacion_home');

            const container = document.createElement("div");
            container.className = "currency-switch-container-home";

            const switchDiv = document.createElement("div");
            switchDiv.className = "currency-switch";

            const arsOption = document.createElement("span");
            arsOption.className = "currency-option selected";
            arsOption.tabIndex = 0;
            arsOption.role = 'button';
            arsOption.ariaLabel = 'Select ARS currency';
            arsOption.innerText = "ARS";

            const usdOption = document.createElement("span");
            usdOption.className = "currency-option";
            usdOption.tabIndex = 0;
            usdOption.role = 'button';
            usdOption.ariaLabel = 'Select USD currency';
            usdOption.innerText = "USD";

            const containerInfo = document.createElement('div');
            containerInfo.className = 'containerInfo-switch';

            const iconSwitch = document.createElement('i');
            iconSwitch.className = 'image-switch';
            iconSwitch.innerHTML = `<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="14" height="14" viewBox="0 0 14 14" fill="none"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7.33335 0.00341797C3.65335 0.00341797 0.666687 2.99008 0.666687 6.67008C0.666687 10.3501 3.65335 13.3368 7.33335 13.3368C11.0134 13.3368 14 10.3501 14 6.67008C14 2.99008 11.0134 0.00341797 7.33335 0.00341797ZM8.00002 4.67008H6.66669V3.33675H8.00002V4.67008ZM8.00002 10.0034H6.66669V6.00342H8.00002V10.0034Z" fill="#1B1B1B"/></svg>`;

            const tooltipContainer = document.createElement('div');
            tooltipContainer.className = 'tooltip-container';
            tooltipContainer.style.opacity = '0';

            const tooltip = document.createElement('span');
            tooltip.className = 'tooltip-text';
            tooltip.innerText = copys[getLang()];
            tooltipContainer.appendChild(tooltip);

            const arrowTooltip = document.createElement('i');
            arrowTooltip.className = 'arrow-tooltip';
            arrowTooltip.innerHTML = `<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="25" height="12" viewBox="0 0 25 12" fill="none"><path d="M12.9444 12L24.5 -1.04907e-06L0.499999 0L12.9444 12Z" fill="#1B1B1B"/></svg>`;
            arrowTooltip.style.opacity = '0';

            iconSwitch.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => {
                tooltipContainer.style.opacity = '1';
                arrowTooltip.style.opacity = '1';
            });

            iconSwitch.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
                tooltipContainer.style.opacity = '0';
                arrowTooltip.style.opacity = '0';
            });

            let selected = sessionStorage.getItem("FB665-homeSwitch") || 'ARS';

            if (selected === 'USD') {
                usdOption.classList.add('selected');
                arsOption.classList.remove('selected');
            } else {
                arsOption.classList.add('selected');
                usdOption.classList.remove('selected');
            }

            arsOption.addEventListener('keydown', function (event) {
                if (event.key === 'Enter' || event.key === ' ') {
                    event.preventDefault();
                    this.click();
                }
            });

            usdOption.addEventListener('keydown', function (event) {
                if (event.key === 'Enter' || event.key === ' ') {
                    event.preventDefault();
                    this.click();
                }
            });

            arsOption.addEventListener("click", () => {
                if (selected !== 'ARS') {
                    trackEvents('Change_ars_home');
                    arsOption.classList.add('selected');
                    usdOption.classList.remove('selected');
                    selected = 'ARS';
                    sessionStorage.setItem('FB665-homeSwitch', 'ARS');
                    updateUrlAndReloadHome("AR");
                }
            });

            usdOption.addEventListener("click", () => {
                if (selected !== 'USD') {
                    trackEvents('Change_usd_home');
                    usdOption.classList.add('selected');
                    arsOption.classList.remove('selected');
                    selected = 'USD';
                    sessionStorage.setItem('FB665-homeSwitch', 'USD');
                    updateUrlAndReloadHome("OTHER"); // Mover la actualización de URL aquí para que se ejecute solo si hay un cambio
                }
            });

            tooltipContainer.appendChild(tooltip);
            containerInfo.append(iconSwitch, tooltipContainer, arrowTooltip);
            switchDiv.append(arsOption, usdOption, containerInfo);
            container.appendChild(switchDiv);
            homeDiv.appendChild(container);

            let boton = document.querySelector(".ibe-search_action_button.button");
            if (boton) {
                boton.addEventListener("click", () => {
                    trackEvents("Clic_buscar_" + selected.toLowerCase())
                    let tripTypePage = document.querySelector("#arrivalDateInputLabel") ? 'RT' : 'OW'
                    let dataSearched = {
                        pos: 'ar',
                        tripType: tripTypePage,
                        originalSearch: selected,
                        selectedOption: selected,
                    };
                    saveData(dataSearched);
                });
            }
        };

        const trackearEventos = (data) => {
            let ibTracked = false;
            let obTracked = false;
            let confTracked = false;

            let currency = data.selectedOption;
            let flightType = data.tripType;
            let original = data.originalSearch;

            setInterval(() => {
                const pageID = getPageID();
                if (pageID.includes("ib") && !ibTracked) {
                    ibTracked = true;
                    obTracked = false;
                    confTracked = false;
                    trackEvents("Visualizacion_Availability_IB_" + currency.toLowerCase() + "_from_OB_" + original.toLowerCase());
                } else if (pageID.includes('ob') && !obTracked) {
                    obTracked = true;
                    ibTracked = false;
                    confTracked = false;
                    trackEvents("Visualizacion_Availability_OB_" + currency.toLowerCase() + "_" + flightType);
                    if (sessionStorage.getItem("FB665Switch") != null && !document.querySelector(".currency-switch--availability")) {
                        switchAvailability();
                    }
                } else if (pageID.includes('conf') && !confTracked) {
                    confTracked = true;
                    ibTracked = false;
                    obTracked = false;
                    trackEvents("Visualizacion_Resumen_Availability");
                    trackEvents("Visualizacion_Resumen_" + currency.toLowerCase() + "_from_OB_" + original.toLowerCase())
                }
            }, 1000);
        };

        const gottaRechargePage = () => {
            const dataSearched = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("FB665Switch"));

            if (dataSearched) {
                if (getPos() == "ar" && dataSearched.selectedOption == "USD") {
                    return true;
                } else if (getPos() == "otr" && dataSearched.selectOption == "ARS") {
                    return true;
                }
            }
            return false;
        }

        const rechargePage = () => {
            const dataSearched = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("FB665Switch"));

            if (dataSearched) {
                if (getPos() == "ar" && dataSearched.selectedOption == "USD") {
                    updateUrlAndReload("OTHER", "USD");
                    return true;
                } else if (getPos() == "otr" && dataSearched.selectOption == "ARS") {
                    updateUrlAndReload("AR", "ARS");
                    return true;
                }
            }
            return false;
        }

        const updateUrlAndReload = (posCode, currency) => {
            let currentUrl = new URL(window.location.href);
            currentUrl.searchParams.set("posCode", posCode);
            currentUrl.searchParams.set("currency", currency);
            window.location.href = currentUrl.toString();
        };
        const updateUrlAndReloadHome = (posCode) => {
            let currentUrl = new URL(window.location.href);
            currentUrl.searchParams.set("posCode", posCode);

            window.location.href = currentUrl.toString();
        };

        const switchAvailability = () => {
            const availability = document.querySelector(".journey-selector.journey-selector-outbound");
            const dataSearched = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("FB665Switch"));

            let posAV = getPos();
            let currency = getCurrencyAvailability();
            let flightType = dataSearched.tripType
            let original = dataSearched.originalSearch;

            let datos = {
                pos: posAV,
                tripType: flightType,
                originalSearch: original,
                selectedOption: currency,
            };
            saveData(datos);

            if (!document.querySelector(".currency-switch-container-availability")) {
                if (availability) {
                    availability.classList.add('NS023');
                }
                const availabilityDiv = document.querySelector(".journey-selector_header_content");
                const container = document.createElement("div");
                container.className = "currency-switch-container-availability";

                const switchDiv = document.createElement("div");
                switchDiv.className = "currency-switch--availability";

                const arsOption = document.createElement("span");
                arsOption.className = "currency-option";
                arsOption.tabIndex = 0;
                arsOption.role = 'button';
                arsOption.ariaLabel = 'Select ARS currency';
                arsOption.innerText = "ARS";

                const usdOption = document.createElement("span");
                usdOption.className = "currency-option";
                usdOption.tabIndex = 0;
                usdOption.role = 'button';
                usdOption.ariaLabel = 'Select USD currency';
                usdOption.innerText = "USD";

                if (currency == "ARS") {
                    arsOption.classList.add("selected");
                } else if (currency == "USD") {
                    usdOption.classList.add("selected");
                }

                arsOption.addEventListener('keydown', function (event) {
                    if (event.key === 'Enter' || event.key === ' ') {
                        event.preventDefault();
                        this.click();
                    }
                });

                usdOption.addEventListener('keydown', function (event) {
                    if (event.key === 'Enter' || event.key === ' ') {
                        event.preventDefault();
                        this.click();
                    }
                });

                arsOption.addEventListener("click", () => {
                    if (!arsOption.classList.contains("selected")) {
                        arsOption.classList.add("selected");
                        usdOption.classList.remove("selected");
                        if (original == "ARS") {
                            trackEvents('Return_ars_Availability_OB_' + dataSearched.tripType);
                        } else {
                            trackEvents('Change_ars_Availability_OB_' + dataSearched.tripType);
                        }
                        let datos = {
                            pos: posAV,
                            tripType: flightType,
                            originalSearch: original,
                            selectedOption: "ARS",
                        };
                        saveData(datos);
                        updateUrlAndReload("AR", "ARS");
                    }
                });

                usdOption.addEventListener("click", () => {
                    if (!usdOption.classList.contains("selected")) {
                        usdOption.classList.add("selected");
                        arsOption.classList.remove("selected");
                        if (original == "USD") {
                            trackEvents('Return_usd_Availability_OB_' + dataSearched.tripType);
                        } else {
                            trackEvents('Change_usd_Availability_OB_' + dataSearched.tripType);
                        }
                        let datos = {
                            pos: posAV,
                            tripType: flightType,
                            originalSearch: original,
                            selectedOption: "USD",
                        };
                        saveData(datos);
                        updateUrlAndReload("OTHER", "USD");
                    }
                });

                switchDiv.appendChild(arsOption);
                switchDiv.appendChild(usdOption);
                container.appendChild(switchDiv);
                availabilityDiv.appendChild(container);
            }
        };

        const saveData = (dataSearched) => {
            sessionStorage.setItem("FB665Switch", JSON.stringify(dataSearched));
        };

        const getCurrencyAvailability = () => {
            return new URL(window.location.href).searchParams.get("currency");
        }

        const getLang = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("lang");
        };

        const getPageID = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pag");
        };

        const getPos = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pos");
        };

        const useFullstory = () => {
            if (typeof FS !== 'undefined') {
                FS.event('AT_592522_VersionB', {
                    campaignId: '592522',
                    campaignRecipeId: '1',
                    offerId: '2144762'
                })
            }
        }

        const trackEvents = (identificador) => {
            const pushClickanalitycs = e => { let t = "AT_592522_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " ANALITYCS: ", t), window[analitycsElem].push({ event: "sendTargetEvent", target_action: t }) }, trackEvent = (e, t) => { let a = "AT_592522_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " MBOX: ", a), adobe.target.getOffer({ mbox: a, type: type, params: { ATFunctionName: "adobe.target.getOffer", campaignId: "592522", "audienceReport_592522": !1 }, success: () => { "function" == typeof t && t() }, error: (e, t) => { console.error("conv -> trackEvent Request failed", e, t) } }) };
            //try { trackEvent(identificador, "click"); } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to adobe: ", error); }
            try { pushClickanalitycs(identificador) } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to analitycs: ", error); }
        }

        if (device === "des") {
            preload();
        }
    })();

</script>
